    chaos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    chaos.social

    Users: 623 . Toots: 13028 . Connections: 883 . Language: English

    chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
    chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).
    Follow @ordnung for low-traffic instance-related updates.

    More Info... Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

    Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

    Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

    Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

    Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

    Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests

    Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

    You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which also provides a list of currently blocked or silenced instances, alongside with reasons. We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

    Email: contact@chaos.social

    Admin: @ordnung@chaos.social

    tvasahi.jikkyo.tv

    Balloo!TV実況(テレビ朝日)

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    テレビ実況用マストドンです！
    こちらは、テレビ朝日放送に関する実況専用となります。

    ご利用にあたって

    • 特定の個人、団体等を中傷、非難する発言や道徳的に問題のある発言などの投稿は固く禁じます。
    • 暴力的なもの、裸が写っているものなど、他人を不快にする内容のコンテンツと判断される可能性がある画像/動画のアップロードを固く禁じます
    • 著作権を侵害する恐れのある画像/動画の投稿もご遠慮ください。

    テレビの実況専用のマストドンです。

    Admin: Not Available

    webcommunity.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 75 . Toots: 256 . Connections: 123 . Language: English

    webcommunity.club

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @davatron5000@webcommunity.club

    mastodon.sandwich.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Sandwich

    Users: 323 . Toots: 1047 . Connections: 517 . Language: English

    This is Sandwich 's public Mastodon instance. Welcome! Moderation is at our discretion - please see below.
    We recommend that you read the #MastodonSandwich hashtag and @sungo's toot about Mastodon's risks . Feel free to chat with us about risk, privacy, security, and other questions.
    We support free and controversial speech, but also wish to maintain a pleasant environment. We forbid trolling, harassment, bigotry, and spam. Please use the Content Warning feature for NSFW or traumatic topics. When handling problems, we try to consider all of the circumstances, and to be reasonable and understanding.
    We will not sell your data, and will make every reasonable attempt to combat coerced disclosure of your data or our logs.

    Contact

    James Renken

    @jrenken

    Business e-mail:

    support@sandwich.net

    Email: support@sandwich.net

    Admin: @jrenken@mastodon.sandwich.net

    don.tacostea.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ドンタコス

    Users: 20 . Toots: 2623 . Connections: 414 . Language: English

    こんな人とお話したい！

    だいたい 0x20 代までの若い エンジニア (業種不問)やエンジニアに なってしまいそうな人 たちを募集しています。

    お前は何を言っているんだ

    エンジニアならではの話や、趣味の話などオススメはありますが、基本的にどんな話題でも大丈夫です。(ただしお約束を参照)

    年齢も自称0歳から0x20代まで幅広く歓迎しています。

    お約束

    各種国内法の範囲内でお楽しみください。

    下ネタNGです。

    他のサーバ・ユーザへの迷惑行為は発見次第ブロック等の処置を行います。

    交流断絶中のサーバ

    以下のドメインは上記のお約束的に、あるいはなんとなくアウトなので、ブロック(原則サイレンス)しています。連合TLには表示されません。(個人でフォローする分には問題ありません)

    securitymastod.one

    about

    preview

    join

    Security Mastodon

    Users: 2393 . Toots: 10669 . Connections: 917 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance for information security pros and enthusiasts. Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Didn't get a confirmation email? Check spam. Still no? Email notifications@securitymastod.one and ask to be manually activated.

    More Info... Donate to hosting expenses at PayPal or Patreon Hosting expenses are currently on a special; $63.99 total per year on an OpenVZ hosting provider. (This introductory price will probably not last, but a year is forever in internet time...) However, we have frequently experienced downtime due to hosting provider issues such as running into simultaneous connection limits, etc. The goal of asking for donations is to get $370/year to upgrade to a KVM VPS or dedicated server on a more stable hosting provider. This site is run by @scriptjunkie

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @scriptjunkie@securitymastod.one

    babuu.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Babuu（バブー）

    Users: 271 . Toots: 10067 . Connections: 218 . Language: English

    【Babuuについて】

    Babuuは育児に関わる方々を対象としたMastodonのインスタンスです。 現在テスト運用中です。

    父母はもちろん、祖父祖母おじおば、教育、医療、福祉関係者etc…育児に関わる方ならだれでもOK!

    育児の合間の一息に、ママさんパパさん達のコミュニケーションに、ぜひご利用ください。

    More Info... ■最低限の利用ルール

    たとえそれがかわいい赤ちゃんでも、局部の写り込んだ写真の投稿はNGです。

    R18の投稿はお控えください。判断が難しい場合は積極的にCWやNSFWを投稿時にに活用しましょう。

    その他公序良俗に反する投稿は禁止します。

    ■お知らせについて

    Babuu内部向けアナウンスは以下のアカウントから行います。

    Babuu(@Babuuclub)

    ■管理者とお問い合わせ先

    管理者は@itacchiku(2児の母)です。

    問い合わせは、

    Babuu(@itacchiku)

    Twitter(@itacchiku)

    までご連絡ください。

    ■ちょっとしたQ&A;

    ・登録メールが届かない

    登録時の返送メールがとどかない場合、迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられていることがよくあるようです。ご確認ください。

    ・ログインしてみたら画面が真っ黒

    マストドンは現在IE非対応となっています。IE以外のブラウザでログインするか、スマホアプリをご利用ください。

    ・外部インスタンスとの接続について

    一部のR18系をメインとしたインスタンスとの接続を除き、自由に開放しています。R18または差別的なトゥートの多いインスタンス及びアカウントがあれば、管理人までお知らせください。

    Email: babuu.club@gmail.com

    Admin: @Babuuclub@babuu.club

    教育学習ICTマストドン elict-mastodon

    Users: 65 . Toots: 724 . Connections: 170 . Language: English

    教育とICT関係に集う人達のマストドン Education & Learning with ICT Mastodon @ Japan

    教育とICT関係に集う人達のマストドンです。現在は実験インスタンスのため、運用は試行錯誤と助言に拠っています。また登録についても比較的オープンにしていますが、実験成果に応じて変更していきたいと思います。管理には最善を尽くしますが、皆様各自でのセキュリティ対策はお忘れなきようお願い申し上げます。教育とICTの分野が盛り上がる一助になりますよう。

    Admin: @kotatsurin@elict.net

    pawoo.net

    Code of Conduct

    We are dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone, and we do not tolerate harassment in any form.

    Please follow our code and rules:

    Be professional.

    Be responsible.

    Be welcoming.

    Be kind.

    Be respectful of other viewpoints and ideas.

    Be supportive and look out for each other.

    Don't flood

    Use NSFW tags for sensitive content

    Use content warning for spoilers

    mastodon.osaka

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.Osaka

    Users: 1 . Toots: 28 . Connections: 160 . Language: English

    サイトの説明文

    mastodon.direct

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 99 . Toots: 319 . Connections: 644 . Language: English

    Mastodon.direct is an open Mastodon instance welcoming people to discuss a broad range of topics. We strive to provide a high quality instance with reliability, speed, and a responsive moderation team.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    For abuse or copyright reports, please email abuse at this domain.

    Email: hello@mastodon.direct

    Admin: @djchen@mastodon.direct

    im-in.space

    about

    preview

    join

    SPAAAAACE!

    Users: 344 . Toots: 3201 . Connections: 1011 . Language: English

    Space. Space? I'm in space!
    This instance is using the Flat, Dark and Colourful! (Blue and Orange) stylesheet by @dia@aleph.land .
    Please follow @status to get updates and news!

    Space Core image by TertonDA

    More Info... Stats

    Status

    -

    NetData

    Registrations closed?

    Do you want to join but the registrations are closed? Ask Kody on that birbsite or on Mastodon with kdy@im-in.space! (Or use that as an email.)

    Code modifications

    We've made some changes to the Mastodon code and styles to personalize this instance. Our code is available on GitHub at im-in-space/mastodon.

    Blocked accounts and instances

    Due to the nature/behavior from some instances or users, we have silenced or suspended some of them. The complete list is available on GitHub, here.

    Basic rules

    Don't be a d*ck, respect the others (no hate speech) and fight in direct messages.

    Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any political incorrect stuff out of the public timeline.Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends and with people who are okay about that.

    If I get reports because you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.

    NSFW is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the message text box). Loli, gore and rape is not allowed.

    Don't make parody accounts and don't spam.

    We don't like bots who randomly follow users.

    Respect French law.

    In case of non-respect of those rules, use the report link (in the toot menu) or contact @kdy.

    Server info

    Like many other French people did, this server is hosted at Scaleway, in Paris.

    VC1M (4 x86 64bit Cores, 4GB memory) with a 50GB LSSD. Storage can be upgraded after a quick reboot.

    IPv4: 163.172.147.245

    IPv6: 2001:bc8:4400:2500::25:907

    We do daily offsite and encrypted backups.

    We will never look at your private toots, unless someone sends us a report about it.

    How long until this instance shuts down?

    Except if I suddenly don't have any money to run this, this instance will be running until the domain expires.

    For now it's until April 15th 2018, but we can renew it before we get there.

    Email: kdy@im-in.space

    Admin: @kdy@im-in.space

    kosmos.social

    about

    preview

    join

    kosmos.social

    Users: 165 . Toots: 1631 . Connections: 560 . Language: English

    A friendly place for tooting. Run by the Kosmos peeps.

    More Info... Technical Details

    kosmos.social is currently hosted on a dedicated server at Hetzner in Germany (renewable energy source, German laws apply). We configure and deploy everything via Chef cookbooks. Your uploads are stored on Amazon S3. Automated backups are run regularly and pushed to S3 as well.

    Our fork of the source code is publicly available at https://github.com/67P/mastodon/ (we deploy the kosmos branch). We frequently update the repo and running code with the latest fixes and improvements.

    TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.

    IRC room

    If you're into that jazz, you can find us in #kosmos on Freenode. If there's no immediate response to a question, just idle for a while.

    The Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kosmos.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mail@kosmos.org

    Admin: @kosmos@kosmos.social

    eu1.mastoburn.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastoburn Social Network #EU1

    Users: 44 . Toots: 1248 . Connections: 451 . Language: English

    [FR]

    Bienvenue sur MastoBurn !

    Les inscriptions sont ouverte.

    Cette instance possède la dernière version stable de Mastodon V1.3.3 (08/05/2017 11h30)

    Cette instance sera maintenue sur le long terme.

    Cette instance est administrée par des passionnés de serveur et du Self-hosting, qui passe tous leurs temps libres à avaler de la documentation. Cette instance a pour but de contribuer au développement de Mastodon, réseau social Décentralisé.

    N'hésitez pas à nous rejoindre et à partager l'instance Mastoburn à tous vos amis

    Pour toutes questions sur notre instance contact@mastoburn.com

    [EN]

    Welcome to MastoBurn !

    The sign up is open.

    This Mastodon is administered by enthusiasts of server technology and self-hosting solution, who spends all their free time to eat linux documentation.

    This Mastodon will be maintained over the long term.

    Feel free to join us and share the Mastoburn instance to all your friends

    For any questions about our instance contact@mastoburn.com

    More Info... [FR]

    Règles de MastoBurn:

    Pas de SPAM/FLOOD.

    Pas de propos, ni de contenus média Racist, sexist, homophobic, pédopornographique etc ...

    Le contenu non adapté à un public jeune (-18 ans) sont autorisé mais doivent êtres balisées de manière responsable en “Content Warning” (CW) / NFSW

    Pas Pub sauf si accord des Admins.

    L'Anglais, L'Américain et toutes les langues de l'Union Européenne sont autorisé sur cette instance.

    ⚡Règlement en construction⚡

    👮S'il vous semble qu'un utilisateur de MastoBurn ne respecte pas une règle énoncée ci-dessus, je vous invite à signaler le Pouet en question.

    Administrateurs et comptes officiel MastoBurn:

    @Lazarik Administrateur Mastoburn

    @Ronybeck Administrateur Mastoburn

    @BurnStats Bot qui génère des statistique de l'instance Mastoburn

    @TechBurn Compte technique de Mastoburn (annonce maj, maintenance, etc...)

    Info technique de MastoBurn:

    Le serveur est un Dédié hébergé au Pays-Bas

    CPU 8C/8T @2.4 Ghz

    RAM 16 Go DDR3

    SSD 250 Go, les fichiers média sont actuellement stockés sur notre SSD, Nous passerons dans peut de temps sur AS3 pour les fichiers média.

    Network 2.5 Gbit/sec

    [EN]

    Rules of MastoBurn: ⚡Description under construction⚡

    Email: contact@mastoburn.com

    Admin: @Lazarik@eu1.mastoburn.com

    mastodon.e217.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.e217.net （仮称）

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    @Telmina の個人インスタンスです。

    現在試験運用中につき、先着20名ほどでいったん登録を打ち切らせていただきます。

    また、日本人参加者の多い一部の大手インスタンスに対しまして、あえてドメインブロックを設定しております。ご了承願います。

    マッタリお気楽にご参加いただける方のみ 、登録を歓迎いたします。

    More Info... あまり細かい注意点については考えておりませんが、最低限、下記についてはご留意ください。

    このインスタンスは特にテーマを定めていません。基本的に自由に投稿していただいてかまいません。

    ただし、下記に該当する投稿を禁止します。あまりに悪質と判断した場合、管理者は当該アカウントを失効させ、以降のご利用を禁止します。また、警察や裁判所等からの要請に応じてログを提出する場合がございます。

    日本国の法令に反する内容を含む投稿

    犯罪を助長する内容を含む投稿

    短時間の連続投稿や、多数の画像、動画等を添付した投稿

    広告や、一般にスパムと呼ばれる、他者に多大なる迷惑をかける投稿

    その他、公序良俗に反する投稿や、品性が備わっていないと思われる内容を含む投稿（一部大手インスタンスをドメインブロックしている理由がまさにこれです）

    原則として、ご発言は日本語でお願いいたします。そのため、日本語の読み書きが可能な方のみご参加ください。

    管理上の理由で、予告なくサービスを一時的に停止することがございます。

    運営上の理由等で、予告なくサービスを一時的または恒久的に停止することがございます。

    本インスタンス登録によって利用者様からお預かりした個人情報につきましては、本インスタンスの管理・運用およびそれらに付帯する手続きに限定して利用いたします。

    本インスタンスの利用並びに不利用によって生じたいかなる損害、不利益に対しましても、本インスタンス管理者はその一切の責を負わないものとします。

    何かご質問があれば、 @Telmina もしくはTwitterアカウント「@Telmina」まで。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @Telmina@mastodon.e217.net

    toot.oekaki.st まったりお絵描き用

    Users: 380 . Toots: 4301 . Connections: 231 . Language: Japanese

    まったり絵をアップできるお絵かきさん向けマストドンがほしいなあと思って作った小さなインスタンスです。ゆるゆるやっています。
    タイムラインの流れはそんなに速くないので、サブアカ用、おためし利用、お絵描きのアップ、創作活動の進捗報告などご自由にどうぞ。お気軽にご参加ください。

    タイムラインのチラ見はこちら ｜ サーバーの暫定ルールなどはこちら

    【暫定ルール】

    ・エッチな絵・ポルノ絵は投稿しない

    I just opened this instance for the people who like oekaki (drawing & painting), especially for non-pornographic painters. This is a small and quiet instance yet, please feel free to join, toot and post your pictures.

    **temporary rules** Don't post any pictures containing sex & nudity.

    framapiaf.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Framapiaf

    Users: 2659 . Toots: 63763 . Connections: 968 . Language: French

    framapiaf.org

    More Info... Conditions d'utilisation

    Version courte (TL;DR comme on dit chez nous) (version longue)

    On est sympathiques :

    Votre contenu vous appartient (mais nous vous encourageons à le publier sous licence libre) ;

    Framasoft n’exploitera pas vos données personnelles, sauf à fin de statistiques internes (anonymisées) ou pour vous prévenir d’un changement important sur le service ;

    Framasoft ne transmettra ni ne revendra vos données personnelles (votre vie privée nous tient - vraiment - à cœur) ;

    Les engagements de Framasoft résultent d’une démarche militante inspirée du mouvement de l’éducation populaire, vous pouvez les retrouver dans notre Charte des services Libres, Ethiques, Décentralisés et Solidaires.

    Mais il ne faut pas nous prendre pour autant pour des chatons :

    « La loi est la loi, et on ne veut pas finir en taule »

    Vous devez respecter la loi (que celle-ci soit bien faite ou idiote), sinon votre compte sera supprimé

    « Merci d’être poli et respectueux avec ses voisins de service »

    Vous devez respecter les autres utilisateurs en faisant preuve de civisme et de politesse, sinon votre contenu, voire votre compte, pourront être supprimés, sans négociation

    « Si ça casse, on n’est pas obligé de réparer »

    Framasoft propose ce service gratuitement et librement. Si vous perdez des données, par votre faute ou par la nôtre, désolé, mais ça arrive. Nous ferons ce que nous pouvons pour les récupérer, mais nous ne nous assignons aucune obligation de résultat. En clair, évitez de mettre des données sensibles ou importantes sur les services Framasoft, car en cas de perte, nous ne garantissons pas leur récupération

    « Si vous n’êtes pas contents, vous êtes invités à aller voir ailleurs »

    Si le service ne vous convient pas, libre à vous d’en trouver un équivalent (ou meilleur) ailleurs, ou de monter le vôtre

    « Tout abus sera puni »

    Si un utilisateur abuse du service, par exemple en monopolisant des ressources machines partagées, ou en publiant des contenus considérés comme non pertinents, son contenu ou son compte pourra être supprimé sans avertissement ni négociation. Framasoft reste seul juge de cette notion « d’abus » dans le but de fournir le meilleur service possible à l’ensemble de ses utilisateurs. Si cela vous parait anti-démocratique, anti-libriste, anti-liberté-d’expression, merci de vous référer à la clause précédente

    « Rien n’est éternel »

    Les services peuvent fermer (faute de fonds pour les maintenir, par exemple), ils peuvent être victimes d’intrusion (le « 100 % sécurisé » n’existe pas). Nous vous encourageons donc à conserver une copie des données qui vous importent, car Framasoft ne saurait être tenu pour responsable de leur hébergement sans limite de temps

    Email: https://contact.framasoft.org

    Admin: @Framasoft@framapiaf.org

    Loultstodon

    Users: 4598 . Toots: 29512 . Connections: 1217 . Language: English

    Mostly French instance - Read full description for rules.

    More Info... English version below, this instance is motsly french speaking.

    Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires.

    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.

    Les comptes parodiques sont tolérés à condition de signaler qu'ils le sont dans leur description.

    Tous les contenus sont tolérés dans la limite de la légalité, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus

    inadaptés au public mineur ou nsfw.

    N'hésitez pas à signaler tout message ne respectant pas les règles.

    Toute personne ne respectant pas les règles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

    Compliance with the law and respect of other users are mandatory.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited.

    Parody account are allowed as long as their parodic status is clearly indicated in their description.

    Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents.

    Feel free to report any message that do not follow the rules.

    Any user who breaks the rules may get suspended without warning.

    Email: maxime+mastodon@melinon.fr

    Admin: @DrEmixam@social.lou.lt

    mastedm.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastedm - Mastodon for Club Music and EDM Lovers

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: Japanese

    クラブミュージックおよびEDMが好きな人向けインスタンスです。
    トピックは特に縛りはありません。好きなことをトゥートしましょう。

    誹謗中傷や犯罪まがいの発言をするアカウントは通報してください。停止します。

    また、このインスタンスを利用したことによる、またはこのインスタンスでのやりとりによって被害を被ったとしても管理人は責任を問いません。（チケット取引等自由ですが自己責任で。）

    【「Mastodon/マストドン」って何？】
    Twitterを超える?!最近話題のSNS「マストドン」 （https://news.infoseek.co.jp/feature/mstdn/）

    【アカウント登録】
    入力するメールアドレスに登録確認メールが送信されます。
    ドメイン指定受信している人は@mg.mastedm.clubを許可してください。
    ※登録メールが迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられることがあるのでよく確認してください。
    また、パスワードは他のサービスやサイトで使用していないものにしましょう。
    *登録メールが届かない人へ*
    ごめんなさい。yoshida0102@gmail.com宛に、登録したメールアドレスで空メールでも送ってもらえれば登録します。

    【他のインスタンスのフォローについて】
    今のところこのインスタンスを単独にするつもりはありませんのでご自由に。ただしコミュニティ的によければいずれ単独インスタンスにしてしまうかもしれません。

    【スマホアプリ】
    mastodonにはアプリが存在します。ストアで探して好きなものを使ってみてください。

    【イベント宣伝】
    バッチコーイ！！

    keywords: Club,DJ,House,Techno,EDM,DnB,DUB,TRANCE,Trap,Night Club,Bounce,Hip Hop

    クラブミュージックおよびEDMが好きな人向けインスタンスです。 イベントの宣伝バッチコーイ！

    Email: yoshida0102@gmail.com

    Admin: Not Available

    Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires.

    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.

    N'hésitez pas à signaler tout message ne respectant pas les règles.

    Toute personne ne respectant pas les règles pourra voir son compte suspendu.

    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited.

    Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents.

    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){

    (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),

    paoon.club

    about

    preview

    join

    パオーンクラブ

    Users: 28 . Toots: 734 . Connections: 337 . Language: English

    ゆるーく繋がりたい。そんなあなたにオススメします。
    ローカルタイムラインはバスの時刻表よりもゆったりです。
    いつでもどこでも、パオーンしたくなったら、パオーンクラブに行ってみよう。
    このインスタンスは自宅サーバーで運用されています。予告なくサービスの停止が発生する場合がございます。ご了承ください。

    免責

    基本的に対応できる時間が朝の4時から5時の朝活の時間のみとなっておりますので、何かあってもそこまでは対応できないことが多いです。すみません。

    禁止事項

    ・公序良俗に反する行為

    ・サーバーに著しく負担をかける行為

    ・botやツールの使用は制限しませんが、他の利用者の迷惑になる行為や、サーバーのリソースを使い果たす行為、ただの実験行為などは他のインスタンスで行うか、自分でインスタンスを立てましょう。

    ゆったりとした時間が流れますように。

    Email: twitter : @szsuke

    Admin: @szsuke@paoon.club

    エンシェントマストドン

    shigadon.com

    about

    preview

    join

    滋賀丼

    Users: 78 . Toots: 486 . Connections: 225 . Language: English

    「滋賀丼」 滋賀県民の憩いの場。

    滋賀 、 びわ湖 に関する、滋賀に住む、滋賀に関係のある、滋賀の大好きな方々によるコミュニティーです。

    More Info... 滋賀丼と申します。

    滋賀、びわ湖に関する、滋賀に住む、滋賀に関係のある、滋賀の大好きな方々によるコミュニティーです。

    特徴など

    毎朝3時〜6時ごろにメンテナンスしてます。5分程度アクセスができなくなります。

    ルールなど

    日本の法律に反する行為や犯罪行為は禁止です

    公序良俗に反する行為はおやめください

    他者の権利を侵害する行為は禁止です

    実在の人物・団体などのなりすましは禁止です

    サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為は管理人の負担になるのでおやめください

    明確にBOTと判断できない形で、交流を目的としない自動投稿および連携投稿は禁止します。

    みんな仲良く

    サーバロケーション

    ConohaVPSの東京リージョンで以下のスペックにて動作しています。最小構成ですが、4月末現在でDISCの使用量は30％程度です。登録者数に影響するのかな。

    vCPU数

    1

    Core

    メモリ

    512

    MB

    ディスク

    20

    GB SSD

    サーバースペック

    CentOS7

    Nginx 1.12.0

    PostgreSQL 9.4

    Redis 2.8.17

    サーバー維持費に関して

    「滋賀丼」の運営維持への支援をお願いいたします。

    寄付には２種類あり、１回だけの寄付と毎月の寄付の形があります。毎月の場合は、その下の「購読をキャンセル」のボタンにて解除ができます。

    お名前掲載をご希望の場合はメールなどでごいただければ対応させていただきますので、お気軽にご連絡ください。

    Paypalの決済サイトに飛びますので、サイトの指示に従っていただければご支援いただけるようになっております。

    １回払いでの登録となります。

    滋賀丼の寄付

    1. ¥300 JPY

    2. ¥500 JPY

    3. ¥1,000 JPY

    毎月払いでの登録となります。

    滋賀丼の維持費(毎月)

    1. : ¥100 JPY - 毎月

    2. : ¥300 JPY - 毎月

    3. : ¥500 JPY - 毎月

    毎月払いを選択頂いた方で、キャンセルをご希望の方は以下のリンクで 手続きを進めてください。

    その他

    メールが届かないという方は直接下記へお問い合わせください。メールアドレスが間違ってる場合は個別対応となります。

    謝辞

    滋賀丼についてのページはこんじまさんのぺーじを参考にさせていただきました。

    Email: rinmon1963@gmail.com

    Admin: @rinmon@shigadon.com

    Mediacast - Vox Populi

    Users: 24 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 190 . Language: English

    Open comment on current affairs with a Canadian focus . This instance embraces freedom of expression, as defined by our Charter . "Speak freely", says the law student grading their own paper.

    More Info... Open to all, free to use.

    Terms of Use

    We're working on it.

    Conduct

    Failure to use the "#nsfw" tag when media attached to a message depicts material unsuitable for viewing by a Canadian youth audience (persons under 18 years of age), examples of which include:

    nudity

    graphic violence

    Content

    The following types of content are explicitly forbidden and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children and youth (persons under 18 years of age)

    Threats of violence

    Content illegal in Canada and/or the United States of America.

    Federated instances

    Generally, follow their rules when visiting. Remote members will be expected to follow ours. For jurisdiction, start at the beginning.

    Network abuse

    Don't do it.

    発信者情報開示の方針

    利用者のIPアドレス等の開示請求は請求者の属性（個人、法人、公的機関等）に関わらず、令状や裁判所命令などがある場合にのみ応じます。任意の協力要請については特別の緊急性（自殺の予告など）がある場合のみ応じます。

    日本マストドンインスタンス管理者連絡会(Japan Mastodon Instance Admins' Liaison group)は日本のＭastodonインスタンス管理者のための連絡会です。インスタンスの規模は問いません。インスタンスが完全沈黙した場合などの非常連絡にお使いいただけるかと思います。

    myfreckle.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon - Myfreckle - Welcome

    Users: 66 . Toots: 111 . Connections: 244 . Language: English

    myfreckle.com

    More Info... About myfreckle.com:

    We believe Social Media is changing the world.

    This instance is for people who are fascinated with and enjoy being part of the change that Social Media is bringing.

    This instance has been set-up and continues to be maintained by professional developers. This instance is hosted on Amazon AWS infrastructure. We realise dependable infrastructure is important for a Social Media network to remain useful.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of myfreckle.com; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    General Rules and Guidelines

    Be nice to each other.

    Use common sense.

    Corporate accounts are welcome, but don’t overdo the posting and no direct advertising.

    Parody accounts are fine (identify your account as a parody), impersonation of others is not allowed.

    Bots are not allowed to post to the public timeline unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Automated posting is not allowed unless permission has been received from an admin.

    Content / behaviour that is illegal in the United States of America, Canada, France, Germany, United Kingdom or Australia is not permitted on this instance. Breach of this will result in a permanent ban of the account.

    The following content will be removed from the timeline and will get your account permanently banned:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    Pornography and sexually explicit content

    Gore and extremely graphic violence

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    The administrators reserves the right of admission to this instance and the right to change the above from time to time except where limited by law. If there are any comments, questions please email the admins at freckle@myfreckle.com - please be patient as a response may take some time.

    Email: freckle@myfreckle.com

    Admin: Not Available

    anti.energy

    about

    preview

    join

    so very tired

    Users: 53 . Toots: 1359 . Connections: 656 . Language: English

    NO. FUCKING. NAZIS.

    More Info... This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything.

    I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I'd really rather let users make their own sense of it.

    This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking.

    I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we'll see what's cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it.

    If I can get the new UI working, I'd like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

    Email: superbranch@riseup.net

    Admin: @superbranch@anti.energy

    glitch.social

    about

    preview

    join

    G L I T C H

    Users: 83 . Toots: 16193 . Connections: 764 . Language: English

    UNSTABLE BUT FRIENDLY

    BE WARNED this instance may actually be unstable at times. It will likely be used for experimenting with settings and tweaks to Mastodon. So the place may experience outages, not federate reliably with the rest of the world, have posts go missing, or other technical faults. As such it's meant to be a chill, maybe kinda playful place. Time to see what we can do with this thing! Time to ˥∀IƆOS HƆ⊥I˥⅁

    This instance also has domain level blocks on numerous others, using the block list found here .

    followbots from other instances will be blocked. please report them

    Some rules

    • Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
    • Racist, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
    • You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)
    • try to be kind
    • no non-sentient bots until further notice
    • no shit that's illegal in Canada
    • animated gifs should always be marked sensitive/NSFW and identified as animated gifs (for now let's say just putting 'gif' in the text of the toot is sufficient), because they can cause serious problems for people

    some guidelines

    • stuff here is impermanent but i still want this to be as safe a space as we can reasonably make it. let's keep common triggers and angry/ranty/grumpy toots behind CWs
    • free speech maximalists can kindly fuck off. there are instances where that is a priority. this is not one of them.
    • all languages are welcome!

    the privacy stuff in the 'terms' isn't what it should be, but no time to change it yet. this instance's data will not be sold or traded or whatever.

    Contact

    beatrix bitrot

    @bea

    Business e-mail:

    haha@noooope.com

    Email: haha@noooope.com

    Admin: @bea@glitch.social

    social.weho.st

    about

    preview

    join

    social.weho.st

    Users: 93 . Toots: 4718 . Connections: 777 . Language: English

    This is an instance of mastodon that runs on the https://weho.st platform. weho.st is a non-profit internet service provider based in Amsterdam in the Netherlands.

    More Info... https://social.weho.st don't make use of advertising or external analytics software and does not make any money with your information. For more information on weho.st visit our FAQ.

    Blocked servers

    We have silenced the server pawoo.net due to a flood of images that are illegal in the US and EU. Their admin hasnt taken actions to moderate this content, if they do then we will consider removing the block.

    We aim to not block instances unless they are serving illegal content under Dutch or EU laws. We do not enjoy or condone censorship but fulfil our legal requirements when necessary.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administrators of social.weho.st.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: hello AT weho DOT st

    Admin: @realitygaps@social.weho.st

    emacs.li

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon @ emacs.li

    Users: 12 . Toots: 790 . Connections: 430 . Language: English

    Open registration; email is a "work in progress" so confirmations may be manually processed.

    Rules:

    Don't be a jerk.

    Earn your bullshit. No ban evasion. While any account under your control is suspended or terminated, further use of this site is unauthorized. You may not access this site using any other account, nor register a new account under a different identity.

    Email: emacs.z.hemka@xoxy.net

    Admin: @hemka@emacs.li

    This site is for my friends. You're welcome if you know me in some way, for instance if we had a drink one day.

    Hébergement : Dublin, Irlande. C'est moi qui décide ce qui est permis ou pas, en tentant de le faire avec bienveillance et en tenant compte de l'avis des inscrits.     i.write.codethat.sucks

    about

    preview

    join

    We write code that sucks

    Users: 62 . Toots: 1043 . Connections: 598 . Language: English

    I write code that sucks, if you do too this is the place for you!

    More Info... Become a Patron!

    Site rules:

    Interaction with the community.

    Remember, people will never forget how you made them feel.

    Tag content that people may not want to see using the content warning function.

    Harassment and bullying of any kind will not be tolerated and will lead to a full suspension.

    Content

    Content illegal in the United Kingdom, France or the Netherlands is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Transphobic, homo/biphobic, racist, etc content is prohibited and will lead to a full suspension.

    Spam is prohibited.

    Bots are allowed but must not interact with users without being explicitly requested to.

    Network

    Please be aware that due to the nature of federated platforms, we have very little control over the behaviors of users from other communities.

    Use the standard mute and block functions where needed.

    However, please report users that offend the CoC of this instance and the administration will take action if necessary.

    Admin decisions are final and are not up for discussion.

    The rules set out above are guidelines for acceptable content/behavior and may be changed any time without notice.

    Please note the administration may take action in cases outside of the rules for the greater need of the community/federation at large.

    Suspended and silenced instances

    pawoo.net (Suspended)

    noagendasocial.com (Silenced)

    Email: kaylee@codethat.sucks

    Admin: @kaylee@i.write.codethat.sucks

    @chr@nightpool

    Until deviation becomes necessary, this instance will follow the terms of service/code of conduct of the flagship instance. Please read and follow them while participating in this community.

    Additional guidelines:

    Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use NSFW tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.

    Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning

    Cybre.space is a multilingual instance and speakers of any language are welcome.

    mastod.life

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastod Life

    Users: 62 . Toots: 135 . Connections: 472 . Language: English

    A friendly mastodon instance for anyone to sign up to.

    • Fast
    • Secure
    • Stable
    • Reliable
    • Friendly
    • Awesome

    This instance does take a lot of hard work to run, and renting servers is not free. If it is at all possible a small donation towards the running costs would be grateful. You can follow this link for a few different methods of donating.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastod.life; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: paul.meeke@acclaro.digital

    Admin: @pmeeke@mastod.life

    mastodon.nara.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    鹿トドン

    Users: 1577 . Toots: 192344 . Connections: 804 . Language: English

    奈良を盛り上げるために作ったマストドンです、もちろん奈良県民以外も大歓迎です。

    More Info... ご利用についてと禁止事項

    基本的にはご自由にお使い下さい

    登録の際、パスワードの使い回しは厳禁です

    必ず日本の法律に従ってください

    R-18コンテンツは投稿不可です

    著作権侵害については十分注意して下さい

    投稿頂きました画像は別サイトにアップさせて頂くこともありますのでご了承下さい

    データの消失などに対しては責任を負いかねますのでご注意ください

    宣伝ばかりのアカウントやTwitter自動連携による投稿をされている方はご注意下さい。こちらから連絡することもあります、連絡がつかない場合やご理解いただけない場合はアカウントを停止させて頂く場合もございます。

    奈良の観光情報も載っています

    鹿達が奈良県の情報をたくさんまとめてくれています、 #奈良トドン で検索して下さい。

    鹿の写真を撮った場合は #鹿スタグラム を付けて投稿して下さい。

    奈良の写真を撮った場合は #奈良スタグラム を付けて投稿して下さい。

    かどの鹿さんが奈良トドンマップを作成してくださいました。

    鹿トドンTシャツを販売しております。原価を除く売り上げは一般財団法人奈良の鹿愛護会様に寄付させて頂きます。

    運営について

    何か問題などがおきましたら管理人にまでご連絡頂ければ幸いです。ツイッターのダイレクトメッセージ（@hirotsugun）などでもかまいません。

    Email: yoshimura@involve-in.jp

    Admin: @hirotsugun@mastodon.nara.jp

    vkdn.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    vkdn.jp

    Users: 186 . Toots: 1382 . Connections: 356 . Language: Japanese

    vkdn （ブイケイディーエヌ、またはブイケードンと読みます）は vkdb.jp が運営するMastodonのインスタンスです。日本の法律を守ってご自由にお使いください。 ヴィジュアル系に強いかもしれません。
    つまり？
    ヴィジュアル系クラスタ向けのSNS。みたいな感じで使ってもらえればと思います。
    こちらからタイムラインをチラ見できます。 vkdnタイムラインチラ見

    公式アカウント

    Mastodon: vkdb@vkdn.jp

    Twitter: @vkdb

    構成

    vkdnはGoogle Cloud Platform上で稼働しています。

    Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, Cloud DNSを利用しています。

    Region

    us-west1

    vCPU

    0.5

    コア

    RAM

    1.7

    GB

    HDD

    30

    GB

    Email: kuwa@vkdb.jp

    mimumedon.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mimumedon

    Users: 3536 . Toots: 632172 . Connections: 219 . Language: English

    Mimumedonはグラブルの話題を中心としたマストドンインスタンスです。

    グラブルが好きでマストドンで遊んでみたいという人が集まる場所となれば幸いです。

    ミムメモ速報の中の人がつくりました。

    お知らせ

    5月11日（木）画像等のファイル消去のお知らせ【完了】

    サーバー容量問題に対応するため、ストレージの移設を行いました。

    その際、既存の画像につきましては全て消去を行いました。

    お手数ですが、プロフィールアイコン等については再設定をお願いします

    アカウントについては引き続きそのままご利用いただけます。

    運営方針について

    「グラブルを遊んでる人が楽しく過ごせる場所」を目指してやっていきたいと考えています。

    ルール・注意事項

    公序良俗に反する投稿はおやめください

    BOTの類となる利用はおやめください

    他者への誹謗中傷、罵倒、暴言、差別的発言はおやめください

    お問い合わせ先

    ミムメモ速報: http://gran-matome.com/

    Mimumedon管理アカウントはこちら　→ @mimumemo

    Twitterアカウントははこちら → @guran_mimumemo

    More Info... イラストについて

    5/18 インスタンス内の画像を変更しました

    インスタンス内で投稿されたイラストなどをロゴとして使用させていただいております！

    pontaroさん（トップページ、ロゴ）

    onamaeさん（インスタンス内、バナー）

    ぴよさん（トップページ、バナー）

    素敵なイラスト＆使用許可ありがとうございます！

    寄付について

    ミムメドンの運用、維持に関する費用についてはEntyを使っての支援も募ることにさせていただきました。

    Entyのページはこちら

    詳しい経緯につきましては@mimumemoのトゥートもご参照ください。

    早くも沢山の方よりご支援をいただくことが出来ました！

    ありがとうございます！

    謝辞

    ★支援者の皆様（5/18更新)

    （敬称略・Entyへの登録順）

    りのす@Durandal / 翔ちん / 情け無用の男 / きのしたひでよし㌠ / 水色 / デビルメロン / 全空一のリリィ / クロ / なぎ / くよー / ガンマレイ / s_kazuto / ししがや / クロゼル / 山那 / 詩紀P@ちくわ㌠ / ぞっくす / ふるぐら / 乞食

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @mimumemo@mimumedon.com

    Microblogging for Legal Professionals

    Users: 20 . Toots: 132 . Connections: 332 . Language: English

    resipsa.social is a microblogging platform, or more accurately an instance of the Mastodon platform, for legal professionals.

    This instance was originally intended to be for legal professionals, but all who respect the rules are welcome.

    In general, the rules are simple: be respectful of others -- their privacy, their content, and their right to be free from harassment.

    Don't be a bad seed.

    social.csswg.org

    about

    preview

    join

    W3C CSS Working Group Mastodon

    Users: 115 . Toots: 95 . Connections: 312 . Language: English

    Mastodon server for anyone interested in CSS or general web development

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.csswg.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: csswg@csswg.org

    Admin: @csswg@social.csswg.org

    kinky.business

    about

    preview

    join

    Kinky Business

    Users: 166 . Toots: 3670 . Connections: 489 . Language: English

    kinky.business is a Mastodon instance for the kink community. All you naughty people are in the right place. Sign up and let's go :)

    More Info... I'm @bedtimedrillsgt, a 30-something Dom. Beard and boobs enthusiast.

    I built this Mastodon instance because there's plenty of room for fun sub-communities in the fediverse. And so, here is a home for all you kinky, filthy fucks.

    Discuss your hopes and desires, post your latest toys or bruises and most of all, have fun.

    If you have any questions or concerns, toot at me

    Rules

    Keep everything here safe, sane, and consensual. No exceptions.

    Do not flood the server with posts

    Use NSFW/CW tags for NSFW media

    Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech

    Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content

    Feel free to report users or content that should not be here.

    Admins of this site reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    A note on federation

    Right now, this is a regularly federated instance. CW tags are somewhat necessary not to get blocked by other servers. In the future, I'd prefer to federate only with other naughty Mastodon instances, and we can drop the CW requirement.

    Email: admin@kinky.business

    Admin: @bedtimedrillsgt@kinky.business

    anticapitalist.party

    about

    preview

    join

    anticapitalist.party

    Users: 878 . Toots: 32478 . Connections: 1105 . Language: English

    Anticapitalist Mastodon instance. Party means fun, not political party. But we're still political.

    This instance follows stable updates (currently v1.3.3), it's not getting dev updates from the master branch.

    Registrations are invite-only on this instance. You must be recommended by a user to get in. How to invite a friend to anticapitalist.party ? Or : Joining anticapitalist.party without an invite

    More Info... Hello everyone! Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

    In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, fat-shaming, ableism, engaging in harrasment, insults, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.

    anticapitalist.party wasn't designed for sensitive militant operations. Such operations shouldn't be discussed here, and on any other social network. Details

    Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here. Illegal content will be deleted,

    and may lead to an account suspension.

    Porn is allowed, with NSFW tag on. Porn without that tag will be deleted.

    Content Warning HAS to be used for the following :

    violence (text and medias)

    stories including *phobias (text and medias)

    sexual content (text and medias)

    Please remember to use the NSFW tags for all of the above, are medias are displayed enven with Content Warning on.

    Parody accounts are allowed, and are advised to specify that they are as such in their description or name.

    We're blocking the following instances (what I think about blocking instances) :

    .tg {border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;}

    .tg td{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg th{font-family:Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:normal;padding:10px 5px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;overflow:hidden;word-break:normal;}

    .tg .tg-9hbo{font-weight:bold;vertical-align:top}

    .tg .tg-yw4l{vertical-align:top}

    instance

    severity

    reason

    shitposter.club

    suspend

    harrassment

    suspend

    annoying bots

    mastodon.technology

    silence

    big instance with no CoC at the time of blocking

    gs.smuglo.li

    silence

    lots of nsfw pictures without the tag

    Please use the report feature if you see a rule violation. Be specific by including a comment

    @Akatookey is in charge of moderation

    @corzntin is in charge of technical and security stuff

    ⚠️ Warning! I am not a professional sysadmin, and downtime may happen — you have been warned.

    Don’t forget to follow me on Mastodon and Twitter to stay up-to-date with problems, updates and server downtime : @corzntin

    Because hosting has a cost, donations can be made on Patreon, PayPal, or using Bitcoins : 13WxR6gsxDu6Wt4JpTHuAxK64GHHzgVHjY. Thanks very much !

    nomofomo.social

    about

    preview

    join

    nomofomo

    Users: 65 . Toots: 456 . Connections: 569 . Language: English

    This is a work in progress so be patient and be cool

    If you want to support this server or continuing development, bitcoin is always appreciated.
    1F69UCFCL24xNcRzCeRFMNmGLuaPi1z8yn

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of nomofomo.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: info@nomofomo.social

    Admin: @internaut@nomofomo.social

    solaria.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Solaria

    Users: 16 . Toots: 104 . Connections: 373 . Language: English

    solaria.space

    More Info... Vous pouvez parler sur solaria.space en toute liberté et en toute sécurité. Toutefois, la liberté ne signifie pas pouvoir parler de tout et de n’importe quelle manière. Les règles suivantes ne sont pas un document légal et l'interprétation finale dépend de l'administration de solaria.space ; elles sont là pour vous donner une idée de nos politiques de modération de contenu :

    Les types de contenu suivants seront supprimés du fil public :

    la publicité excessive ;

    les bots "relais" publiant automatiquement des news de source extérieure ;

    le contenu à caractère pornographique ou sexuellement explicite non tagués NSFW ;

    les contenus violents ou gores non tagués NSFW.

    Les contenus suivants seront supprimés du fil public, et peuvent entraîner la suspension du compte et la révocation de l'accès au service :

    tout contenu sexiste, homophobe, transphobe, ou discriminatoire envers des genres et minorités sexuelles ;

    tout contenu raciste, xénophobe, fasciste, ou de nationalisme violent ;

    tout contenu menaçant, abusif, diffamatoire, constitutif de harcèlement, non respectueux de la vie privée d'autrui, ou autrement répréhensible.

    Les contenus suivants sont formellement interdits et entraîneront la révocation de l'accès au service  :

    la pédopornographie ;

    le négationnisme (tel que la négation de la Shoah) ;

    la propagande de l'idéologie nazie.

    Toute conduite visant à harceler d'autres utilisateurs⋅trices, à les empêcher d'utiliser le service, de dégrader les performances du service ou d'inciter d'autres utilisateurs⋅trices à effectuer l'une de ces actions est également interdit et conduira à des sanctions pouvant aller jusqu'à la révocation de l'accès au service. Cela comprend, mais sans s'y limiter, les comportements suivants :

    continuer à engager une conversation avec un⋅e utilisateur⋅trice qui a expressément demandé que ledit engagement cesse peut être considéré comme un harcèlement, quelle que soit la confidentialité appliquée aux publications ;

    la diffusion des données démographiques, personnelles ou privées d'une personne sans autorisation expresse peut être considéré comme un harcèlement. L'administration du service se réserve le droit de révoquer les autorisations d'accès de tout⋅e utilisateur⋅trice, à tout moment, pour quelque raison que ce soit. N'oubliez pas que l'accès à ce service est un privilège et non un droit.

    Email: admin@solaria.space

    Admin: @etn@solaria.space

    infinimatix.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Infinimatix

    Users: 59 . Toots: 383 . Connections: 422 . Language: English

    Infinimatix, coined by blending infinity and informatics , is a community of interest in informatics with a federated node in the Mastodon fediverse. The topics of informatics that we are interested in are mainly big data, data science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, deep learning, data mining, information systems, cyber security, web design, web development, web performance optimization, human-computer interaction, user experience design, and so on. Reach out to @derekcecillewis if you'd like to have an appropriate discipline added to the list.

    Contact

    Derek Lewis

    @derekcecillewis

    Email: derlewis@iu.edu

    Admin: @derekcecillewis@infinimatix.net

    chofudon.tokyo - チョウフドン

    Users: 50 . Toots: 132 . Connections: 10 . Language: English

    Mastodon for Chofu Tokyo チョウフドンは東京都調布市内在住者・通学者・勤務者及び調布好きな人のためのMastodonです！

    「チョウフドン」は東京都調布市内在住者・通学者・勤務者及び調布好きな人のためのMastodonです！

    「チョウフドン」では位置情報付きの発言ができ、その発言に対して地図が表示されるように、Mastodonのソースコードを変更したものを使用しています。

    変更内容の詳細:

    » Add lat and lng to toot based on v1.3.2 by champierre · Pull Request #2 · champierre/mastodon

    「チョウフドン」で使用しているソースコード:

    » champierre/mastodon: A GNU Social-compatible microblogging server

    Email: chofudon@champierre.com

    Admin: @jishiha@chofudon.tokyo

    ieji.de

    about

    preview

    join

    ieji.de

    Users: 18 . Toots: 93 . Connections: 334 . Language: English

    SECURE multiple A+ TLS ratings ( TLS OBS QUA HTB )
    STABLE financially backed, won't go down in a week like some do
    POWERFUL Intel Xeon E5-1650v3, DDR4-2133 RAM, WD SE HDDs RAID10 (high traffic configs)
    LIBERAL based in Germany , Frankfurt and uses 1984.is DNS and LE Certs
    IPv6 SUPPORT via tunnelbroker.net
    NO LOGS nginx saves no logs, don't know about the mastodon ruby stuff though. Disregard the privacy policy, it's the default one
    USE VIA TOR NETWORK AT iejidevtqqdlukju.onion for extra anonymity (you have to accept an invalid https certificate though, as Let's Encrypt disallows .onion certification)
    KNOW YOUR HOST german legit Impressum (imprint) with many ways to contact

    More Info... Code of Conduct:

    ieji.de is availabe via Tor. That doesn't make this instance free of rules.

    Do NOT:

    - harass people in any way, constructive and founded critisism is ok

    - spam at others, especially on other instances

    - spread explicit pictures of minors

    - spread copyrighted material

    - break german law (no nazis or extremists allowed)

    Depending on the rules broken I may have to report you to german authorities as precise as I can or give you at max two warning before blocking you out.

    I'll do my best to respond to reports asap.

    Abuse of the report option will get you banned after the third misbehaviour.

    If you are an instance admin and run into a problem, be it technical or an abusive user, please reach out to me. Via mastodon account or mail displayed in the contact box.

    Basicly, act accordingly to german freedom of speech rules or prepare to get warned/banned.

    I'll be polishing the CoC soonish!

    Impressum(german imprint)

    Email: tor@ieji.de

    Admin: @SolSoCoG@ieji.de

    creativity.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    creativity.cafe

    Users: 89 . Toots: 2676 . Connections: 647 . Language: English

    creativity.cafe is a Mastodon instance for people who make things - artists of any kind, including visual, musical, glitch, 3d, net art, writing, sculpture, and more. Even people who don't create but are just really enthusiastic about creating are welcome! Come on down to talk shop and be around fellow creators.

    This is an invite only instance, in order to make sure that people who are here truly want to be here (and to keep my server costs low). If you want an invite , send your email and desired username directly to @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com .

    More Info... Da Rules

    Be kind to each other

    Flag looping/flashing GIFs as NSFW for people with epilepsy/nausea/etc.

    Also flag actually NSFW content as NSFW

    This is an arts-focused instance. If you post work that isn't yours, try to find and include the source so we can find more of it :)

    Harassment, slurs, hate speech, etc. explicitly unwelcome

    Not a rule, but when you join feel free to introduce yourself with a post and the #introduction / #introductions tags! It's a great way to get found on the network, meet new people, and greet the community.

    If you have any issues, reports, complaints, bug notes, or requests, you may contact the administrator, Way, via Mastodon at @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com.

    Supporting creativity.cafe

    Like human beings require touch to survive at a young age, instances require money. If you enjoy this instance, you can throw me a dollar or so to my Patreon to make sure it grows up to be strong and healthy.

    Email: wayspurrchen@gmail.com

    Admin: @way@creativity.cafe

    queer.party

    about

    preview

    join

    Queer Party!

    Users: 157 . Toots: 1593 . Connections: 606 . Language: English

    A silly instance of Mastodon for queer folk and queer folk accessories. Let's be friends!

    More Info... Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website,

    aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. The rules pretty much boil down to "be good to each other", but a few rules I'd like to explicitly list out are as follows:

    Any content or postings which may be illegal under French or Scottish law are not permitted.

    Any content or postings containing Nazi symbolism, ideology and the promotion thereof, are strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    Racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and any other discriminatory conduct which attacks any individual or group of individuals based on what they are or what they believe in, is strictly forbidden and also seriously uncool.

    Any conduct which abuses this Mastodon instance, or which causes harm to other Mastodon instances, and/or the users thereof, is strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.

    A status page for this Mastodon instance is available here.

    This Mastodon instance generally operates in open federation, but specific domains are blocked if and when identified as being either indifferent to or permissive of abusive conduct. In the interest of full transparency, this list is published below.

    Table last updated 18/4/17.

    DomainSeverity

    shitposter.clubsuspend

    mastodon.0-z-0.comsuspend

    mastodon.delurk.comsuspend

    notmastodon.xyzsuspend

    mastodon.desync.netsuspend

    tooter.frsuspend

    mastodon.hostsuspend

    freezepeach.xyzsuspend

    sealion.clubsuspend

    rainbowdash.netsuspend

    social.heldscal.lasuspend

    pawoo.netsilence reject-media

    Email: mastodon-queeries@maff.im

    Admin: @maffsie@queer.party

    hamtter.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Hamtter[For Radio Amateur]

    Users: 48 . Toots: 895 . Connections: 91 . Language: English

    hamtter.netへようこそ。
    アマチュア無線家 のためのMastodonインスタンスです。
    ※フリーライセンスラジオやBCL/SWLは扱いません。
    登録時の ユーザー名 は必ずご自身に割り当てられている アマチュア無線のコールサインを半角英数大文字 で指定してください。
    例) JA1QRZ 7K4QTH 等
    アマチュア無線を楽しんでいることの確認のため、 登録用メールアドレスは文末のいずれかのドメイン名のみ 受け付けます。
    本登録に必要な電子メールが送信されますので、事前に正しく転送されるか確認後に登録作業を行って下さい。
    @jarl.com @arrl.net
    Internet Explorerは使えません。
    他のブラウザを使って下さい。
    For Amateur Radio Operator .
    Notice:NO CB Radio or BCL/SWL.
    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case) .
    example) W0QRZ KA1QTH etc.
    Valid mail address,below domains ONLY.
    @jarl.com @arrl.net
    Mastdon NOT SUPPORT Internet Explorer.

    Username or screen name Must set your Amateur Radio Callsign(Upper Case).

    ユーザー名にアマチュア無線のコールサインを設定し忘れた方は、ユーザー設定にて表示名に半角英数大文字で入れて下さい。

    NO WARRANTY AS-IS.

    このインスタンスは極力安定稼働へ努力をいたしますが、個人で運営しているため、動作は無保証、あるがままです。

    他インスタンスからリモートフォローをしてきたユーザは必ずしもアマチュア無線家とは限りません。

    迷惑だと感じた場合はブロックを推奨します。 参加することによる金銭的な損失、個人情報などの毀損については一切関知しません。

    Email: je4smq@jarl.com

    Admin: @JE4SMQ@hamtter.net

    ソーシャルゲーム

    Users: 280 . Toots: 4190 . Connections: 359 . Language: English

    本インスタンスは成人コンテンツ可能なインスタンスです
    R18コンテンツが嫌いな人は以下をご利用ください。
    ここは、R18も可能なインスタンスです。R18限定インスタンスではありません。
    https://socialgame.mstdn.cloud
    ソシャゲ好きな人用のインスタンスです。
    ソシャゲが好きな人が集まれる場所として作りました。
    内容はソシャゲ限定というわけではなく、好きな内容を話してもらって大丈夫です。
    ソシャゲもグラブルでもFGOでもなんでもどうぞ。
    なるべく運営し続けるつもりでいますが、運営継続の保証はないです
    アカウント凍結についてですが、報告があった場合は管理人の一存で対応します。その点ご容赦ください。
    また、自由なコミュニケーションを維持する観点で報告がなければ基本対応しません。
    節度を持ったコミュニケーションをお願いします。
    お約束として、日本の法律に準拠してください
    こちらのサイトでインスタンスに参加する前に直近数件の発言を確認できます
    http://junk.azyobuzi.net/mastodonptl/

    animalliberation.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Animal Liberation Network

    Users: 594 . Toots: 1528 . Connections: 515 . Language: English

    Animal Liberation Network is a community for animal activists on the Mastodon network. You can connect with other activists through the local timeline , as well as spread your activism to the outside world with the federated timeline . Please read our rules !

    More Info... This is a website by and for animal activists.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of animalliberation.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Speciesism or advocation of speciesism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: alex@alexgleason.me

    Admin: @alex@animalliberation.social

    mangadon.net

    about

    preview

    join

    マンガドンー漫画ファンの為の日本初のマストドンです。

    Users: 378 . Toots: 1203 . Connections: 1264 . Language: English

    マンガドン
    日本初のマンガ好きの方の為の漫画用マストドン、それがマンガドンです！ オススメ漫画の紹介や、感想、作品の告知なんかを通して交流しましょう～。
    マンガは本当に素晴らしい文化です。
    戦前から脈々と続く文化的な蓄積もさることながら、新しい名作が次から次へと登場します。何十年もマンガを読んでおりますが、いまだに「これはすごい！」という作品に、1年に何回も出会えます。
    低コストで作れて、ハリウッド大作にも引けを取らない物語世界を構築できるマンガは、日本のエンターテイメント産業の宝だと思います。マストドンを通して、面白いマンガの情報や感想を共有しましょう。
    これは別のお話になってしまいますが、才能に自信のある方は、是非、漫画家を目指して欲しいと思います。日本中の才能がマンガ界に集まれば、ドラゴンボールのように世界に旅立つ作品が、今後も現れ続けるでしょう！

    More Info...

    -------------------------------------------------------------

    ★重要：登録確認メールが、迷惑メールフォルダに届く場合が多いようです！！特にGmailを使用している方からのご連絡が多いです。ご確認頂ければ幸いです！HTMLメールが受信できないスマホ等では登録できません！

    ※善は急げ！ということで、急きょ開始致しました！今後の運営方針がまだ確定しておりません。

    【利用規約/免責事項/禁止事項について】

    ★トゥートに内容に関するトラブル等には、管理人は対応致しません。トゥートしたご本人に法的な責任が生じます。発言内容については、十分気を付けてトゥートして下さい。登録のメールアドレスのIPアドレスから個人の特定はできますので、よろしくお願い致します。多くの方が見ておりますので、特定の個人への威圧的なコメントや不快な発言をすることは禁止です。

    ★アカウント凍結について

    特定の方のコメントが不快に思う方は、基本的にはどんどんとミュートやブロックをお願い致します。不快な状況が続いた場合は、そのトゥート内容を通報して下さい。５回以上、同様の通報を受けたアカウントは、こちらでもトゥート内容を確認した上で、事前の予告なく1～２か月間程度、該当アカウントをサイレンス処理をします。

    サイレンス処理を行うと、ローカルTLにはトゥート内容が表示されなくなります。

    ※フォローしている方のホームTLにはトゥートが表示される可能性がございます。今後、仕様が変更される可能性もあります。

    １～２か月間の期間中に不快な内容や過激な発言がなくなっているようでしたら、サイレンス処理を解除致します。トゥート内容によっては、サイレンス継続かアカウントの完全凍結を致します。嫌がらせ行為は、刑事事件となる威力業務妨害等に該当する可能性もありますので、節度のある交流をお願い致します。

    ※自費で運営しておりますので、サーバの処理能力が非常に低スペックです。サーバーに負荷の掛かる行為は禁止させて頂きます。一度に30件以上のCSVフォローリストをインポートすると、処理能力を超えてしまいます。大量のフォローリストのインポート等は絶対にお控え下さい。Pawoo等と比べると数千倍のサーバスペックの差がありますので、ご理解頂ければ幸いです。

    ※他のインスタンスのアカウントのフォローは原則禁止です。本インスタンスとは関係のないデータが大幅に増えるので、アクセスが遅くなったり、HDDの容量が一杯になってしまうなどの弊害が出る為です。他インスタンスのフォローは、pawoo.netやfriends.nico等のアカウントからお願い致します。

    ※インスタンステーマと関係のない宣伝目的のアカウントは即時アカウントを削除致します。貧弱サーバなんです。

    ※捜査機関等からの要請が来た場合は、アドレス等の個人情報を提供する可能性がございます。

    ※サーバー費用等の負担が結構大きい為、今後運営費を賄う為に、広告等が入る可能性がございます。最終的に毎月ウン十万程度のサーバー費用が掛かる可能性もございます。

    ご投稿頂いたトゥートは、多媒体での紹介や人口知能を用いたサービスで利用させて頂く場合がございます。収益が発生した場合は、運営しているインスタンスを継続させる為の費用（サーバー代、運営費等）に充てさせて頂きます。

    ※退会処理の機能は、現在のマストドンにはございませんので、管理者にご連絡頂いても対応致しかねます。予めご了承下さい。退会に近い処理を行いたい方は、ご自身でトゥートを削除し、フォロワーをブロックし、フォローを外し、パスワードを変え、メールアドレスを捨てアドに変更する等の対応を行って頂く必要がございます。

    https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3　等WEB上のページをご参照下さい。

    ※利用規約に変更があった場合はこちらのページにてご報告致します。当インスタンスが別途定める場合を除き、本ページ上に規約を表示した時点より効力が生じるものとします。

    ※このインスタンスの利用に際し、利用規約の解釈及び適用については、日本の法律に準拠いたします。本規約に関連する一切の紛争は、東京地方裁判所を唯一の合意専属管轄裁判所とさせて頂きます。

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @mangakantoku@mangadon.net
