    social.bytesexual.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Bytesexual Mastodon

    Users: 276 . Toots: 3710 . Connections: 507 . Language: English

    social.bytesexual.net is a Mastodon instance run by the Merry Men of bytesexual.net . All fun and no SLA since 2012.
    We run this instance for ourselves and our friends. Courteous lifeforms of all backgrounds are welcome to coexist with us.
    Lead maintainer is @q3k , follow for service updates.

    Bytesexual Networks is a transcontinental non-profit guerilla of {sys,net}ops specializing in shoestring budget infrastructure for Hackerspaces and other NGOs.

    This instance is physically hosted in France by a hosting company registered in the same country. The maintainers of this instance are EU citizens.

    We have not been served any secret court orders and are not under any gag orders.

    Email: q3k@q3k.org

    Admin: @q3k@social.bytesexual.net

    ゲーム制作箪笥

    Users: 798 . Toots: 9379 . Connections: 485 . Language: English

    ゲーム製作者用のインスタンスです。
    ゲーム製作者が集まれる場所として作りました。
    ゲームを制作に関わっていれば特にどういう関わり方でもフリーです。
    ゲーム制作に興味がある方も歓迎です。
    会話内容はゲーム制作に限る必要はなく好きな内容を話してもらって大丈夫です。
    成人指定画像の取り扱いについては、禁止はしませんが運用で注意してください。
    (周りで扱いがはっきりしてくればそのルールに合わせるつもりです)
    なるべく運営し続けるつもりでいますが、運営継続の保証はないです
    アカウント凍結についてですが、報告があった場合は管理人の一存で対応します。その点ご容赦ください。
    また、自由なコミュニケーションを維持する観点で報告がなければ基本対応しません。
    節度を持ったコミュニケーションをお願いします。
    お約束として、日本の法律に準拠してください
    こちらのサイトでインスタンスに参加する前に直近数件の発言を確認できます
    http://junk.azyobuzi.net/mastodonptl/
    また、以下で寄付も受け付けています。
    https://enty.jp/dwbFiNqsAkCO
    支援してくださった方々(敬称略,順不同)
    @404
    @fukurow
    @tmkyz
    @lplplp
    @EllenSvanholm
    @anno_kgrzk

    皆様の協力で運営できています。大変ありがとうございます！
    また、申し訳ないことにお名前がわかっていない方がいらっしゃるので、お気づきの際は是非ご連絡ください。

    social.etc-services.de

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon social.etc-services.de

    Users: 41 . Toots: 138 . Connections: 336 . Language: English

    It's an open Mastodon instance, feel free to join us ;)

    More Info... Blocked servers

    There are no blocked servers atm.

    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.etc-services.de.

    They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: social@duke.de

    Admin: @duke@social.etc-services.de

    mstdn.awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon at Keio University

    Users: 670 . Toots: 8399 . Connections: 341 . Language: Japanese

    このインスタンスについて / About this mastodon instance

    keio.ac.jp か keio.jp なメールアドレスを持っている人が利用できるmastodonインスタンスです。教育・研究目的のため、研究室の垣根を超えたスタッフによって運営されています。慶應義塾が正式に設置したインスタンスではありません。

    Anyone who has keio.ac.jp or keio.jp email address can signup this instance.

    注意事項 / ToS

    本インスタンスは本インスタンスは慶應義塾大学の資産並びに、SFC-CNS上で運用されています。 SFC-CNS利用内規 IIならびに、 keio.jp利用規程 で定める禁止事項に該当する利用(例.商用、公序良俗に反する投稿など)は固く禁止します。

    This instance is running on the assets of Keio University and network connectivity has provided by SFC-CNS. Activities prohibited by Internal Rules for Using SFC-CNS and keio.jp Terms of Use are also prohibited on this instance.

    SFC-CNS や keio.jp等、各種慶應義塾が提供するサービスで使用するパスワードと同一のパスワードを本サービスで使用することは、セキュリティ上リスクがありますので、控えてください。

    問い合わせ / Contact Us

    本インスタンスについての問い合わせは、 mstdn-ops@awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp までお願いいたします

    If you wish to contact us, please send a mail to mstdn-ops@awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp

    連絡先

    Hirotaka Nakajima (中島 博敬)

    @nunnun

    ビジネスメールアドレス:

    mstdn-ops@awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp

    Email: mstdn-ops@awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp

    Admin: @nunnun@mstdn.awa.sfc.keio.ac.jp

    Der er lidt problemer med mail-serveren så hvis du ikke får en bekræftelsesmail når du forsøger at tilslutte dig, så send mig en email. Så tilføjer jeg dig manuelt.

    Hold kammertonen og overhold dansk lov.

    Og husk at det betyder meget på Mastodon hvem de andre på ens server følger, fordi de, og dem de snakker med, er de mennesker der dukker op i den fødererede tidslinie.

    Så bidrag gerne med nogle gode folk at følge ...

    Email: JensE@puggaard-nyborg.dk

    cuttlefi.sh

    about

    preview

    join

    Cuttlefish

    Users: 6 . Toots: 36 . Connections: 20 . Language: English

    Cuttlefish

    More Info... By charging a small monthly amount, Cuttlefish can pay its costs and its development team a fair wage and distribute the rest back to its members.

    Cuttlefish is in the early stages of formation. We have an idea of how we’d like it to operate, but are figuring out the details as we go. The answers below sketch our current thinking about the project and the direction we hope to go in the future.

    Q&A;

    Why shouldn’t I sign up for a free social network?

    You can, and if you prefer you should. Cuttlefish is an alternative that attempts to answer the question of how a social network can be run without showing you ads or selling your information. Since Cuttlefish runs inside a larger OStatus network, members can interact with a larger community of users.

    Mastodon was written by volunteers, and other instances are run by volunteers as well. Why not donate your time instead of asking for money?

    The progress that the maintainers and contributors to Mastodon and OStatus is impressive, and their dedication to the stewardship of these projects is admirable. Our focus is on creating a sustainable instance, and we think that means having a dedicated staff working on the project. That gives us time to devote to moderation, maintenance, and contributing back to the open source projects that are being used to run Cuttlefish. We don’t think that this would be possible if running Cuttlefish was treated as a side project.

    Why not just accept donations?

    Accepting donations leads to some members having undue influence in the community, because their donations are required to cover operating costs. We ask each user to contribute equally to the cost of running the service, with the hope of returning membership fees to active members.

    What do you mean by active members?

    At this point, just members in active standing. In the future, this might also include looking at who is posting good stuff within their local network. We realize that add more terms to unpack, and raises more questions than it resolves. Our goal is to promote a healthy community, and we will be looking at how different means of profit-sharing might help that being achieved.

    How are membership fees redistributed?

    Our intention is to do this on a quarterly basis, and initially by equally dividing profit between members. During the initial quarter of a membership, the amount returned will be based on the percentage of the quarter for which the membership was active.

    How are the operating costs determined?

    Currently we are basing our operating costs on having one developer, one community moderator, and a part-time operations manager work on the project. There are also legal issues that require counsel that will need to be addressed in the initial months of operation. We estimate operating costs for the first month to be around twelve thousand US dollars. We will be publishing our actual operating costs quarterly, and revising that estimate to account changes in staffing.

    Who is running this instance?

    Cuttlefish is currently solely sponsored by the team at Standard Library, a small development firm that works inside of the cultural sector. We have a strong experience in building and maintaining Rails applications.

    Email: cuttlefishcoop@gmail.com

    Admin: @root@cuttlefi.sh

    mammouth.cafe

    about

    preview

    join

    Mammouth Café

    Users: 90 . Toots: 3505 . Connections: 778 . Language: English

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.
    PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

          .----.-.     _____________________________________
     /    ( o \   /   Welcome! Bienvenue! Willkommen!   \
    '|  __ ` ||  /\  Benvenuta e benvenuto! Bainvegni!  /
     |||  ||| -'   -------------------------------------

    (In the spirit of tilde.club ...)

    English: Mammouth Café is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.
    Registrations will be limited to 640 users ( ‘640 users ought to be enough for anybody.’ — Bill Gates ).

    Français: Mammouth Café est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur français et ouverte au monde. Nous accueillons particulièrement volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et auteurs, les bibliothécaires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ingénieures et les ingénieurs, les enseignantes et enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.
    Les inscriptions à cette instance seront limitées à 640 utilisateurs ( «640 utilisateurs devraient suffire à quiconque.» — Bill Gates ).

    Italiano: Mammouth Café è un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, così come tutte le menti curiose.
    Le iscrizioni su questa istanza saranno limitate a 640 utenti ( “640 utenti dovrebbero bastare a chiunque.” — Bill Gates ).

    With ❤ from Atelier Mammouth .

    More Info... [ English | Français | Italiano ]

    (Source)

    English

    Welcome to the Mammouth Café

    In the spirit of tilde.club, here are a few, simple rules:

    Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.

    There is NO GUILT here. NOR SHAME. Not knowing things is fine. Not finishing them is fine too.

    We're all trying, and we're all in this together. :)

    IMPORTANT NOTE: PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.

    Guidelines

    Aside from the general rules stated above, mammouth.cafe follows principles similar to those of mastodon.social, to wit:

    Absolutely no content allowed that would be illegal in Switzerland and/or France.

    No discrimination, no racism, no xenophobia, no sexism, no incitement to hate or to violence of any kind.

    We take a very dim view of stalking or harassment of other persons, here or elsewhere.

    Same goes for encouraging or inciting other people to take part in such activities.

    There are CW (Content Warning) and NSFW (Not Safe For Work) options: use them accordingly when you post.

    No hard or child/minor pornography of any kind, and keep material of an erotic nature behind CW and/or NSFW filters.

    No gore or extremely graphic violence.

    No spam, no ads, no affiliate links or excessive promotion.

    Of course, you are still welcome to announce your latest comic, self-published novella or upcoming local amateur theatre stage play to our community.

    We discourage any sort of corporate accounts: we prefer to keep it personal.

    On the other hand, educational institutions, associations and other non-profit organisations (such as e.g. amateur dramatics groups) are warmly welcome.

    No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

    We discourage bots, unless they're cute or friendly.

    Robots that bang on the server will get bitcanned.

    Replicants are like any other machine: they’re either a benefit or a hazard. If they’re a benefit, it’s not our problem.

    No zombies allowed under any circumstance.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    Final interpretation and implementation of these rules, guidelines and of general good netiquette, as well as all decisions that may result in account suspension and/or revocation of access, will be up to the administration of mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Support is available: ping @support@mammouth.cafe.

    For status updates, planned downtimes and so on, you can follow @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Please remember: this is essentially a one-man show for now, so do not expect an answer within the hour. If it's urgent, try asking the community: someone may be able to lend you a hand.

    We'll try not to mess things up, but we probably will at some point. If you feel that what you post here is vital to you, do make a backup somewhere else (atom feeds are available for every account) or, even better, give some of your time and knowledge to help us out with this thing.

    Handling abuse and harassment

    If you are being abused or harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report."

    If you engage in abusing or harassing behavior, the administration may take any action we deem appropriate, such as an account suspension or revocation of access.

    Abuse is anything we say it is. Too bad if you disagree.

    Blocked instances

    We do block some Mastodon instances where a sizeable part of their community infringes our rules and/or guidelines with their behaviour. We do not usually comment on individual accounts muting, suspension or removal.

    Privacy and security

    We value your privacy. We are here to have fun, not to make any money by throwing ads down your throat or monetizing the shit out of your online activities. No ads or trackers are installed on this instance.

    Please understand however that mammouth.cafe's administrators have potentially access to your data, including your direct messages. The backend is also not encrypted. If this is not all right with you, this might not be the instance you're looking for.

    Finally, a word of advice: consider this a public space. Whatever you publish here is public and can (and probably will) be read by someone else or potentially be archived by the Internet Archive and/or other similar insititutions.

    We'll try to keep things reasonably safe, but if you need to keep your sources confidential or you are involved in activities that may put yourself or others in jeopardy in your country or elsewhere, please take into account the fact that we won't be able to offer you the necessary confidentiality and/or security here.

    Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. Use a dedicated E2E application with good reputation, like e.g. Signal, for the communications you really want to keep private.

    And remember to always practice safe hex.

    About this instance

    This instance is run by Atelier Mammouth in a TARDIS somewhere/time in a big ball of wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey... stuff.

    For the time being, costs for running this server are pretty reasonable and the admin can afford them. You should absolutely not feel obliged to pay anything, but if you really wish to support this thing, you can donate something on our Liberapay account. Thank you so much!

    But remember: we only accept donations. You don't pay us for this service. Don't act like you do.

    And remember: this is FREE software and...

    “...if it destroys your computer, rapes your pet, installs Win98 on your toaster and microwave, stops your pacemaker, causes sexual dysfunction, and turns your children into fucked-up trenchcoat-wearing teens carrying guns and worshipping Hitler, don't blame me because I told you it could do that and you went ahead and used it anyway.”

    — James Turinsky

    ⤴

    Français

    Bienvenue au Mammouth Café

    Dans l'esprit du tilde.club, voici quelques règles simples:

    Amusez-vous. Respectez les autres. Pas de drame.

    Il n'y a PAS DE FAUTE ici. NI DE HONTE. Ne pas savoir quelque-chose c'est bien. Ne pas finir quelque-chose c'est bien aussi.

    Nous faisons de notre mieux, et nous sommes à bord du même bateau. :)

    NOTE IMPORTANTE: SVP NE CASSEZ PAS LE GIBSON.

    Lignes directrices

    Outre les règles générales mentionnées ci-devant, mammouth.cafe suit des principes semblables à ceux de mastodon.social, à savoir:

    Nous ne permettons absolument aucun contenu qui serait illégal en Suisse et/ou France.

    Pas de discrimination, pas de racisme, pas de xénophobie, pas de sexisme, pas d'incitation à la haine ou à la violence d'aucune sorte.

    Nous ne tolérons pas le harcèlement ou l'intimidation d'autres personnes, ici ou ailleurs.

    Nous avons la même attitude envers quiconque encouragerait ou inciterait d'autres personnes à procéder de la sorte.

    Des options CW (Content Warning = avertissement de sujet sensible) et NSFW (Not Safe For Work = pas adapté à un environnement de travail ou public) vous sont proposées: employez-les à bon escient au moment de publier.

    Pas de pornographie dure ou impliquant des mineurs, d'aucune sorte. Veuillez également placer vos contenus de nature érotique derrière des filtres CW et/ou NSFW.

    Pas de contenu violent.

    Pas de spam, pas de pubs, pas de liens affiliés ou de promotion excessive.

    Bien entendu, vous pouvez sans autres annoncer votre dernière BD, votre roman auto-publié ou le prochain spectacle de votre troupe de théâtre amateur locale à notre communauté.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les comptes d'entreprise: on préfère garder une touche personnelle.

    D'autre part, nous accueillons volontiers les écoles, associations et autres organisations à but non lucratif (telles p.ex. les troupes de théâtre amateur).

    Pas de faux comptes personnifiant des célébrités, même dans un but humoristique.

    Nous n'encourageons pas les bots, à moins qu'ils ne soient mignons ou attachants.

    Les robots qui abusent du serveur seront envoyés à la casse.

    Les répliquants sont comme les autres machines: ils sont ou bénéfiques, ou nocifs. S’ils sont bénéfiques, c’est pas notre problème.

    Aucun zombie n'est admis, en aucun cas.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interprétation et l'application finales de ces règles, lignes directrices et de ce qui constitue une bonne nétiquette en général, ainsi que toute décision pouvant résulter en la suspension et/ou la suppression d'un compte, est du seul privilège de l'administration de mammouth.cafe.

    Support

    Vous pouvez contacter notre support en suivant ou contactant ce compte: @support@mammouth.cafe.

    Afin d'obtenir des informations sur le statut du serveur, les arrêts planifiés pour des mises à jour, etc., vous pouvez également suivre @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Veuillez prendre bonne note que ceci est pour l'instant un spectacle interprété et mis en scène par une seule et même personne. Ne vous attendez donc pas à une réponse dans l'heure qui suit. S'il s'agit d'une urgence, essayez de poser votre question à l'ensemble de la communauté: il se peut que quelqu'un puisse venir à votre aide.

    Nous allons tâcher de ne pas gaffer, mais probablement que cela nous arrivera un jour ou l'autre. Si vous considérez ce que vous publiez ici comme absolument vital pour vous, faites-en une sauvegarde ailleurs (des flux atom sont disponibles pour chaque compte) ou, encore mieux, mettez à disposition un peu de votre temps et de vos connaissances pour nous aider avec tout ceci.

    Traitement des abus et du harcèlement

    Si vous êtes victime d'abus ou de harcèlement, veuillez signaler l'utilisateur à l'aide du bouton "…" puis "Signaler".

    Si vous avez un comportement abusif ou harcelant, l'administration peut prendre toute mesure que nous jugeons appropriée, telles une suspension de compte ou une révocation d'accès.

    Un abus est tout ce que nous considérons comme tel. Tant pis si vous n'êtes pas d'accord.

    Instances bloquées

    Nous bloquons certaines instances de Mastodon dans les cas où une partie importante de leur communauté enfreint nos règles et/ou lignes directrices avec son comportement. Nous ne faisons généralement aucun commentaire au sujet des comptes individuels ayant été rendus silencieux, suspendus ou supprimés.

    Confidentialité et sécurité

    Nous respectons votre vie privée. Nous sommes ici pour nous amuser, pas pour gagner de l'argent sur votre dos en vous faisant avaler des tonnes de pubs indigestes ou en monétisant à longueur de journée vos activités en ligne. Aucune publicité ou traceur n'est installé sur cette instance.

    Veuillez toutefois prendre bonne note que les administrateurs de mammouth.cafe ont potentiellement accès à toutes vos données, y compris vos messages directs. Le backend n'est pas chiffré non plus. Si cela ne vous convient pas, ceci n'est peut-être pas l'instance que vous recherchez.

    Enfin, un bon conseil: considérez ceci comme étant un espace public. Tout ce que vous publierez ici est public et peut être (et probablement sera) lu par d'autres personnes ou potentiellement être archivé par l'Internet Archive et/ou d'autres insititutions similaires.

    Nous allons tâcher de maintenir une sécurité raisonnable, mais si vous êtes dans l'obligation d'assurer la confidentialité de vos sources ou que vos activités risquent de mettre en péril vous-même ou d'autres personnes dans votre pays ou ailleurs, veuillez tenir compte du fait que nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir une confidentialité et/ou sécurité suffisante ici.

    En outre, pour des données vraiment privées envoyées entre deux personnes, Mastodon n'offre aucun chiffrement de bout en bout (end-to-end). Utilisez une application E2E dédiée avec une bonne réputation, comme Signal par exemple, pour les communications que vous souhaitez vraiment garder privées.

    Et n'oubliez pas de toujours vous protéger lors de toute activité hexuelle.

    À propos de cette instance

    Cette instance est gérée par l'Atelier Mammouth depuis un TARDIS quelque-part/temps dans une sorte de grande boule de truc-machin tempo-spatio... bidule.

    Pour le moment, les coûts liés à ce serveur sont plutôts raisonnables et l'administrateur peut se les permettre. Vous ne devez absolument pas vous sentir obligés à payer quoi que ce soit, mais si vous désirez vraiment soutenir cet effort, vous pouvez faire un don sur notre compte Liberapay. Merci beaucoup!

    Mais rappelez-vous: nous n'acceptons que les dons. Vous ne nous payez pas pour ce service. N'agissez pas comme si c'était le cas.

    Et rappelez-vous: ceci est un logiciel LIBRE et...

    “...s'il détruit votre ordinateur, viole votre chat, installe Win98 sur votre grille-pain et sur votre four à micro-ondes, bloque votre stimulateur cardiaque, vous rend impuissant et transforme vos enfants en de foutus ados portant des vestes en cuir, brandissant des armes et adorant Hitler, ne me blamez pas car je vous avait averti qu'il pourrait faire tout ça, et vous n'avez pas voulu m'écouter et vous l'avez quand-même utilisé.”

    — James Turinsky (traduit de l'anglais)

    ⤴

    Italiano

    Benvenuta e benvenuto al Mammouth Café

    Nello spirito del tilde.club, ecco alcune regole semplici:

    Divertiti. Rispetta le altre e gli altri. Niente drammi.

    Qui NON C'È COLPA. NÈ VERGOGNA. Non sapere qualche cosa va benissimo. Non finire qualche cosa va pure benissimo.

    Facciamo del nostro meglio, e siamo a bordo della stessa nave. :)

    NOTA IMPORTANTE: NON PIRATARE IL GIBSON, GRAZIE.

    Linee direttrici

    Oltre alle regole generali di qui sopra, mammouth.cafe segue principi simili a quelli di mastodon.social, vale a dire:

    Non permettiamo assolutamente nessun contenuto illegale in Svizzera e/o Francia.

    Nessuna discriminazione, nessun razzismo, nessuna xenofobia, nessun sessismo, nessun incitamento all'odio o alla violenza di alcun genere.

    Non toleriamo molestie o intimidazioni di altre persone, qui o altrove.

    Lo stesso vale per l'incorraggiamento o l'incitamento verso altre persone a prendere parte a tali attività.

    Ti proponiamo delle opzioni CW (Content Warning = avviso di contenuto sensibile) e NSFW (Not Safe For Work = non adatto ad un ambiente di lavoro o pubblico): utilizzale come si deve al momento di pubblicare.

    Nessuna pornografia dura o minorile di alcun tipo. Inoltre, pubblica il tuo materiale di natura erotica dietro filtri CW e/o NSFW.

    Nessun contenuto violento.

    Nessuno spam (pubblicità non richiesta), nessuna pubblicità, nessun rinvio (link) affiliato o promozione eccessiva.

    Naturalmente, se vuoi annunciare il tuo nuovo fumetto, il tuo ultimo romanzo autopubblicato o il prossimo spettacolo della compagnia teatrale amatoriale del tuo quartiere alla nostra communità, non c'è nessun problema.

    Scorraggiamo i conti aziendali: preferiamo mantenere un tocco personale.

    D'altra parte, accogliamo ben volentieri scuole, associazioni e altre organizzazioni non a scopo di lucro (come ad esempio una compagnia di teatro amatoriale).

    Nessun conto fasullo che impersno personaggi famosi, anche se solo a scopo umoristico.

    Scorraggiamo i bots, a meno che siano carini o amicali.

    I robot che abusano del server verranno rottamati.

    I replicanti sono come ogni altra macchina: possono essere un vantaggio o un rischio. Se sono un vantaggio, non sono un problema nostro.

    Non sono ammessi zombi, sotto nessuna circostanza.

    GNU Terry Pratchett.

    L'interpretazione e l'applicazione finali di queste regole, linee direttrici e di ciò che costituisce una buona netichetta in generale, così come ogni decisione che può risultare in una sospensione del conto e/o una revocazione dell'accesso, sono in ultima istanza il privilegio dell'amministrazione di mammouth.cafe.

    Supporto

    Puoi seguire o contattare @support@mammouth.cafe per il supporto.

    Per informazioni sullo stato del server, sospensioni pianificate del servizio, ecc., puoi seguire @status@mammouth.cafe.

    Prendi buona nota del fatto che questo è per ora uno spettacolo diretto e interpretato da una sola persona. Non attenderti dunque ad una risposta nell'ora che segue. Se la tua domanda è urgente, prova a porrla alla communità: qualcun'altro potrebbe darti una mano.

    Cercheremo di non combinare guai, ma probabilmente lo faremo ad un momento o ad un altro. Se credi che ciò che pubblichi qui è di importanza vitale per te, fanne una salvaguardia da qualche altra parte (ci sono dei feed atom a disposizione per ogni conto) o, ancora meglio, offri un po' del tuo tempo e delle tue conoscenze per darci una mano con tutto questo.

    Trattamento di abusi e molestie

    Se sei vittima di abusi o molestie, segnala l'utente utilizzando il pulsante "…" e poi "Segnalare".

    Se hai un comportamento abusivo o offensivo, l'amministrazione può intraprendere qualsiasi azione che riterrà opportuna, come una sospensione del conto o una revoca dell'accesso.

    Abuso è ciò che noi consideriamo come tale. Se non sei d'accordo: peccato.

    Istanze bloccate

    Procediamo al blocco di alcune istanze Mastodon nei casi in cui una parte significativa delle loro communità violi le nostre regole e/o linee direttrici con il loro comportamento. In genere non commentiamo su conti individuali resi silenziosi, sospesi o soppressi.

    Privacy e sicurezza

    Rispettiamo la tua privacy. Siamo qui per divertirci, non per fare soldi sul tuo gobbo faccendoti inghiottire tonnelate di pubblicità indigeste o monetizzando tutto il giorno (e la notte) le tue attività online. Nessuna pubblicità o tracker sono presenti su questa istanza.

    Tuttavia, ricordati che gli amministratori di mammouth.cafe hanno potenzialmente accesso a tutti i tuoi dati, inclusi i tuoi messaggi diretti. Inoltre, il backend non è crittografato. Se questo non ti si addice, questa non è l'istanza che stai cercando.

    Infine, un buon consiglio: considera tutto questo come se fosse uno spazio pubblico. Tutto ciò che pubblicherai qui, sarà esposto al pubblico e potrà essere (e probabilmente sarà) letto da altre persone oppure potrà potenzialmente essere archiviato dall'Internet Archive e/o altre istutuzioni affini.

    Cercheremo di mantenere un livello di sicurezza ragionevole, ma se ti trovi in una situazione dove hai l'obbligo di mantenere la riservatezza delle tue fonti oppure nella quale le tue attività rischiano di mettere in pericolo te stesso o altre persone, nel tuo paese o altrove, ti preghiamo di notare che non siamo in grado di offrirti delle condizioni di privacy e/o di sicurezza sufficienti.

    Inoltre, per inviare dati in modo veramente privato tra due persone, Mastodon non offre alcuna crittografia da un capo all'altro (end-to-end). Utilizza un'applicazione dedicata E2E con buona reputazione, come Signal per esempio, per le comunicazioni che veramente desideri mantenere private.

    E ricordati di sempre proteggerti durante ogni rapporto hexuale.

    A proposito di questa istanza

    Questa istanza è gestita dall'Atelier Mammouth in un TARDIS da qualche parte/tempo in una specie di grande sfera di roba spazio-tempo... coso.

    Per il momento, i costi di questa istanza sono piuttosto ragionevoli e l'amministratore se li può permettere. Non devi assolutamente sentirti obbligato a pagare qualsiasi cosa, ma se veramente vuoi sostenere questo sforzo, puoi fare un dono sul nostro conto Liberapay. Grazie mille!

    Ma ricordati: accettiamo solo doni. Non ci paghi per questo servizio. Non agire come se fosse il caso.

    E ricordati: questo è un software LIBERO e...

    “...se distrugge il tuo computer, violenta il tuo gatto, installa Win98 sul tuo tostapane e sul tuo microonde, blocca il tuo stimolatore cardiaco, ti provoca disfunzioni sessuali e trasforma i tuoi bambini in fottuti adolescenti che indossano capotti e brandiscono armi adulando Hitler, non dare la colpa a me perchè ti avevo detto che poteva fare proprio questo, e tu non hai voluto ascoltarmi e lo hai utilizzato lo stesso.”

    — James Turinsky (tradotto dall'inglese)

    ⤴

    We trust you have received the usual lecture from the local System Administrator. It usually boils down to these three things:

    Respect the privacy of others.

    Think before you type.

    With great power comes great responsibility.

    Email: skk@mammouth.cafe

    Admin: @skk@mammouth.cafe

    freehold.earth

    about

    preview

    join

    Freehold Earth

    Users: 139 . Toots: 1179 . Connections: 513 . Language: English

    Freehold.Earth is a free-speech centered community, extremely lightly moderated (we'll do what we can about spam and harassment, and possibly some management of the federated public timeline, that's about it...do as you please when communicating with followers!). More info at https://freehold.earth/about/more

    More Info... Welcome!

    The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we don’t particularly like, to have a voice in the world. While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

    However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be “bad people” or holders of “dangerous opinions” ejected from the community…this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.

    What does this mean in terms of user experience?

    The admins don’t want to hear about your problems with anyone you haven’t both muted and blocked. It’s your job to step away from speech that is troubling to you. We will take action to:

    Try to mitigate spam problems.

    Try to intervene in harrassment, defined specifically as a user persistently contacting another user who has already muted and blocked them. If you didn’t mute and block, they aren’t harrassing you, though they may be annoying. Annoying is not on the list of things we care about.

    Try to mitigate actual security issues.

    Encourage a tolerant and open community where users can control which content they produce and engage with.

    Note the use of “try” and “encourage”…there are things we simply do not control, and we will not sacrifice free speech for everyone in an attempt to make our community a safe haven from all the world’s ills. Earth is a chaotic place, and Freehold.Earth will likely be so as well.

    What should users know?

    A “post” (“tweet” elsewhere) is called a “toot” here. To repeat/amplify a toot is to “boost” that toot.

    We favorite things we like, by clicking the star on the toot.

    The Local Timeline is all public posts at the moment on Freehold.Earth

    The Federated Timeline is every public post from anywhere that is seen by Freehold.Earth – the more remote users followed by our users, the more of a firehose this becomes.

    Are there any tips for being loved and followed by many?

    Generally, we’re not here to tell you what to do…but in case you were wondering what social conventions are popular, consider the following. Observing these tips will also help keep other servers from blocking our traffic!

    Please use the #NSFW tag for NSFW posts…this allows other users to filter their view in public places.

    Please wrap content likely to annoy some of your audience (politics, rants, etc) in a CW (Content Warning).

    Please don’t use an animated GIF for your avatar.

    Please place the #bot tag in the profile of any non-human account.

    Please be a bit kinder than is really called for, and disengage rather than escalate when you see drama starting.

    When someone’s being an asshat, please assume it’s out of misunderstanding rather than malice, until they prove you wrong.

    Meet the Freehold.Earth admin team:

    HedgeMage …This is my server, but I’m more often active on my personal account, HedgeMage@maly.io than on Freehold.

    Consentacles …I’m generally friendly…AFTER coffee has been applied.

    KatamariChaos …I like to boost a good toot.

    Nodes (instances) currently blocked by Freehold.Earth

    **NONE**

    A note on bot accounts:

    We are currently experimenting with silencing followbot accounts to reduce noise in the Federated Timeline at Freehold.Earth.

    Follow bot traffic should not appear in the Federated Timeline, if it does, feel free to report it so we can silence.

    Follow bots are NOT under a suspension ban. You can still follow them (and they you) if desired, the traffic just won’t be in the Federated Timeline. Some followbots will not follow users with #nobot in their profile.

    It is possible for bots that are not follow bots to get caught up in this ban. If you think you have seen this happening, please contact the admins.

    A follow bot is a bot that indiscriminately follows most/all users it comes across, in an attempt to increase federation between small servers and the rest of the Fediverse. Because their follow choices are random (and some spew statistics as often as every twenty minutes), we’re hoping that removing this traffic will make Freehold.Earth’s Federated Timeline more relevant and interesting to our users.

    This is currently an experiment and may change at any time.

    Email: admins@freehold.earth

    Admin: Not Available

    nrd.li

    about

    preview

    join

    nrd.li

    Users: 50 . Toots: 2407 . Connections: 782 . Language: English

    A mastodon instance for nerds. If you're passionate about something you're welcome here.

    More Info... Rules

    🤖 Bots welcome, if they aren't bad 💩

    😇 Be good to each other

    📃 Report things that are illegal. They will be removed and/or muted.

    🙊 If you harass users on other instances-- which is to say if you knowingly post content against the ToS of their instance to them-- action will be taken against you on this instance to protect our federation status. In extreme cases knowledge of an instances rules will not be necessary for action to be taken.

    Ultimately this instance aims to be as permissive as possible, while preserving federation with as many nodes as possible. In the interest of openness all administrative actions taken will be announced by a bot user on this instance (to be created when necessary).

    Actual terms of service to come when/if necessary.

    Blocks

    Blocking another instance from federating is, essentially, the nuclear option. I won't say that I will never block an instance, but I hope I never have to. I hope that we can judge people by their interactions with us, instead of where they have the misfortune of registering their account.

    If there is abuse, harassment, discrimination, or general prolonged unkindness from an individual, please report them and they will be silenced. Extreme cases, or people who have a pattern of bad behavior may be suspended. Send reports to @terribleplan@nrd.li

    Free speech is a right that the government cannot infringe upon. It is an important way to spread information however unpopular, hated, misguided, or plain wrong it may be. Luckily I am not the government, and I can choose who can speak (everyone by default), and who cannot on this small corner of the web I run and pay for.

    If there comes to be a democratic blocking system we may subscribe to it, or use it as a source of users to block at our own discretion. We will also report users that we block to such a service.

    Privacy

    This server is hosted in the United States by a US Citizen, and as such is subject to US Law. Any posts that are against the law will be removed and possibly reported to the relevant authorities.

    There is nothing special being done to track users, but the server does keep some logs and other potentially identifying information, including the IP address accessing the site, for abuse detection and statistical reasons. This information is not shared except as required by law.

    Email: kegan@keganmyers.com

    Admin: @terribleplan@nrd.li

    sn.angry.im

    about

    preview

    join

    SN.Angry.Im

    Users: 52 . Toots: 1015 . Connections: 566 . Language: English

    Yet another excited Mastodon instance. This node has not a main focus, and I do think it should never have. Read Rules before deciding to join, please.

    More Info... About Me

    I am @PeterCxy,

    a free-software enthusiast, currently an Undergraduate student.

    I am also a daily Linux user, and learning to be a sysadmin.

    This instance is hosted for personal hobby. It runs on a VM on an online.net server with E3-1231v3, 32G RAM, unmetered up to 1Gbps bandwidth and 2x1T HDD storage. An east-asian reverse proxy is applied for better connection to Asia. I also run my personal blog at https://typeblog.net (in Chinese).

    This instance currently runs Mastodon v1.3.3 on ArchLinux with Docker. Everything rolls fast :) Below after the Rules

    section, you can have an overview on the current status of the server.

    Rules

    This is an open community, so please try to be open and loving to others.

    Please understand this is not the Dark Web.

    Decentralization is not synonym to hidden identity. Contact the admins if anything illegal come in here.

    Sorry, but no politics here, and please avoid extreme religious content. Actually we won't ban you just because content on politics, but please be kindly noticed that it is not the best place for these content here. (But isn't the belief 'decentralization and privacy' itself a political idea? Huh.)

    Use Content Warning (CW) for any possible NSFW content or content that may make people uncomfortable here. BUT NO CHILD PORN ALLOWED. Please use the Report feature if you see any inappropriate content.

    This instance is hosted on a personal server and with periodical backups. Nothing will break soon :)

    I can't make any guarantee on how many registrations can this instance be open to. For now, sit back and relax.

    Donate if you like: 17qX8PpiSCNsqAMVRHA7BWRGcREzgXaH8F (BTC)

    After all, if you are joining this Mastodon instance, it means that you trust the administrator @PeterCxy, who set up and fully manage this instance, because thus he can block you, remove your content, view your email address etc. here. I still recommend that anyone who is able to set up his / her own instance should do it, and this is also good for the ecosystem of GNU Social / Mastodon.

    Have fun and don't be angry :joy:

    Status

    You can also view the complete status page here.

    iframe {

    width: 100%;

    }

    function resizeIframe(obj) {

    setTimeout(function() {

    obj.style.height = obj.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + 'px';

    }, 500)

    }

    var f = document.getElementById("monitor")

    f.onload = function() {

    resizeIframe(f)

    }

    Email: admin@typeblog.net

    Admin: @PeterCxy@sn.angry.im

    ekimemo.info

    about

    preview

    join

    Ekitodon

    Users: 183 . Toots: 2449 . Connections: 261 . Language: Japanese

    ※駅メモファン向けの非公式Mastdonインスタンスです。 お問い合わせは@mystia04まで。
    法律とマナーを守って楽しくTOOTH！


    Welcome to Ekitodon!

    What's this?

    駅メモファンによる、駅メモファン向けの非公式Mastodonインスタンスです。

    特にローカルルール等は設けませんので、法律の範囲内でたのしくお使いください。

    Tutorial

    「何から始めたらいいかわからない！」

    という方は、とりあえずローカルタイムラインへ。

    気になった方がいたらフォローしてみましょう。

    あとはTwitterみたいな要領でLet's TOOTH!

    Attention!

    18禁になりそうなSS等の文章はCW、画像にはNSFWタグをしっかりと付けてください。

    駅メモの絵、スクリーンショット等の画像は二次創作ガイドラインに沿った利用をお願いします。

    Contact

    御用の方は

    当インスタンス：みそいぬ

    JPインスタンス：みそいぬ

    Twitter：みそいぬ

    いずれかのアカウントへどうぞ

    Email: misoinu3@gmail.com

    Admin: @mystia04@ekimemo.info

    mstdn.superspeed-fall.com

    about

    preview

    join

    キャブどん

    Users: 60 . Toots: 323 . Connections: 68 . Language: Japanese

    旧車と珍車を愛し、キャブで吸う空気の美味しさを知っている。
    そんな大人が集うMastodonインスタンスです。

    • タイヤの数は問いません。
    • キャブ/FIどちらでもいいです。そんな不毛な論争はやめよう。
    • 「Come And Buy To…」のアレとはあまり関係がありません。
    • 投稿内容の縛りはありません。

    注意事項

    • 登録とご利用とその後の結果は ノークレーム・ノーリターン でお願いします。
    • ここは公道と同じです。法律とマナー遵守でみんななかよく。
    • インスタンス(サーバー)は旧車・珍車と同じで、予告なしで何かが壊れたりして突発メンテナンスが必要になります。アクセスできないときは見守っててください。
    • 風景や思い出は心に残すものです。データが飛んでも泣かない。

    プライバシーポリシー

    • 管理者がメールアドレスとかそういうのを見るのは、警察とか捜査機関からの要請がきたときです。

    連絡先

    うんすい ほえほえ

    @unsuitan

    ビジネスメールアドレス:

    mstdn.fall@gmail.com

    Email: mstdn.fall@gmail.com

    Admin: @unsuitan@mstdn.superspeed-fall.com

    Physi.cc Mastodon

    Users: 38 . Toots: 1600 . Connections: 684 . Language: English

    Mastodon is a distributed, open-source social platform. This instance is run by a graduate worker and physics PhD candidate in Ithaca NY , but can be used to connect with people on any other GNU Social compatible instance. There are no formal rules on this instance for now, just don't be a jerk! We reserve the right to keep anything and anyone bad off the server.

    scholar.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Scholar Social

    Users: 16 . Toots: 357 . Connections: 305 . Language: English

    A Mastodon instance for academics

    "The Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference"

    Read more ...

    More Info... This is a general-purpose federated Mastodon instance. You may use it as a personal account, but the focus is on academics. This is supposed to be "the Mastodon profile that you're not embarrassed to put on the last slide of a presentation at a conference." :P

    Real names and credentials are recommended for networking purposes but are absolutely not required.

    Do

    Brag about your publications

    Share references and resources

    Network with other academics

    Add CW's (content warnings) to your posts liberally: label strong language, rants, spoilers of TV shows, etc. We're academics! We love meta-data!

    Recruit participants for academic surveys—formal, IRB-approved ones or even informal ones (just make sure to CW them and don't get too obnoxious about it)

    Don't

    Post anything that could be described as "spam"

    Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, etc.

    Impersonate other people

    Harass other people

    In more detail

    Many thanks to mastodon.social, from whom I took these policies.

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of scholar.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: scholar.social.mastodon@gmail.com

    Admin: @socrates@scholar.social

    mastodon.coffee

    about

    preview

    join

    mastodon.coffee

    Users: 41 . Toots: 248 . Connections: 1202 . Language: English

    The coffee flavored instance for all us coffee addicts

    More Info... This is taken straight from mastodon.social as we apply the same guidelines

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.coffee; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: admin@mastodon.coffee

    Admin: @Liljeberg@mastodon.coffee

    latedon.sui-hei.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ウミガメのスープのマストドン『 Latedon 』

    Users: 128 . Toots: 3583 . Connections: 68 . Language: English

    ウミガメのスープのマストドンです。

    ルール

    • 法律は守ってください．犯罪に加担していそうだったり，日本法に抵触するようなトゥートは禁止です．最悪警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示することになります．
    • エログロなどの理由で18禁になりそうな文章にはContent Warningを，画像にはNSFWタグを付けてください．例え付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像はダメです．
    • 連投や，フォロ爆などの過度に迷惑がかかる投稿は禁止です．スパムにしか見えないような宣伝とかもやめてね．
    • みんな仲良く．

    サイトの説明文２

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @sui_hei@latedon.sui-hei.net

    mstdn.mechkey.jp

    Users: 41 . Toots: 124 . Connections: 177 . Language: English

    メカニカルキーボード(というかキーボード全般) ユーザ向けのインスタンスです。詳しくは 詳細 を見てね!

    ルール

    日本の法律に違反する TooT はダメだよ

    R-18 のような子供が見れない TooT もダメだよ🔞

    連投やスパムは迷惑だからやらないでね

    一人でたくさんのアカウントを登録するのはやめてね

    管理出来ない(放置される) BOT は動かさないでね

    話題はキーボードの事でも、他の事でもいいよ

    言語は基本的に日本語だけど、他の言語も歓迎するよ(The basic language is Japanese, but other languages ​​are also welcome!)

    みんな仲良くしてね!

    mastodon.jtwp470.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 23 . Toots: 834 . Connections: 262 . Language: English

    @jtwp470 のmastodonサーバーです。

    More Info...

    Hosted on Amazon Web Service EC2 t2.micro

    Region

    Tokyo

    ap-northeast-1

    vCPU

    1

    Core

    RAM

    1

    GB

    EBS

    30

    GB

    Running Cost: About 0.4 USD / Day (On-Demand)

    OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS

    ルール

    新規登録は受け付けておりますが、サーバーの安定性は保証しません。

    また、予告なくサーバーが停止する恐れがあります。

    さらに、公序良俗に違反するような画像、動画の投稿は禁止します。(と言うか基本的に容量を圧迫するので画像の投稿はおやめください)

    管理人について

    私についてはここを見てください．またはTwitterにも生息しています．

    Twitter: @jtwp470

    お布施

    もしお布施をしてくれる方がいらっしゃればめっちゃ喜びます．

    それを資金にサーバーの増強等を行うかもしれません． お布施先はこちらです。 http://amzn.asia/8I4D1Ru

    Email: rskjtwp@gmail.com

    Admin: @jtwp470@mastodon.jtwp470.net

    mstdn.hakai-macaron.com

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon4Students

    Users: 108 . Toots: 1280 . Connections: 511 . Language: Japanese

    大学のメールアドレスで登録できる学生用Mastodon
    登録できるドメインは
    このインスタンスについて を参照
    ドメインが怪しくてすみません

    More Info... 大学メールドメイン(ac.jp等)でしか登録できません。ご注意くださいメールアドレスの間違いが多いです！お気を付けくださいメールが数分待っても来なかったら再送リクエストしてください

    登録できるドメイン

    一部大学で発行されてる生涯メール専用ドメイン等では登録できません

    なかった場合は一報ください

    ac.jpaoyama.jpc-league.jpchiba-u.jphgu.jpkeio.jpnagoya-u.jpnaist.jpnitech.jpoecu.jpocic.jpoist.jpous.jpsendai-nct.jpsenshu-u.jptokai.jptoyo.jpwaseda.jpynu.jpchibakoudai.jp

    注意

    あくまで学生のお遊び鯖です

    何らかの形でデータ吹っ飛ぶかも、ごめんなさい

    お金がなくなったら支援を募るか、閉鎖します

    立てた目的

    なんとなく面白そう

    学生がお試しで試せるような鯖があればいいな

    自分も学生なのでお試しで立ててみた感はある

    禁止事項

    無断転載禁止

    サークルなどの団体としての登録

    サーバに負荷をかける行為

    その他、法律で禁止されている行為

    まぁ何もかもほどほどに

    その他

    サーバーが死んでたら@tennen_macaronまで

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @macaron@mstdn.hakai-macaron.com

    mstdn-uragi.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    『浦議ドン』浦和レッズについて議論するtwitter

    Users: 348 . Toots: 1060 . Connections: 3 . Language: English

    浦和レッズについて議論するtwitter（のようなもの）『浦議ドン』です。
    ・「負けないよ」の怖さをほとんどの人が知っているtwitter
    ・武藤がゴールをすればお寿司の写真が溢れるtwitter
    ・無失点試合の時はシュークリームをみんなが食べるtwitter
    このような浦和レッズを愛するサポーターだけの空間で浦和レッズの話題が溢れるコミュニティになると嬉しいです。
    ※ご注意※
    ご登録後に確認メールをお送りいたします。事前に「mstdn-uragi.jp」からのメールが受信できるよう設定をお願いします。

    浦和レッズについて議論するtwitter（のようなもの）『浦議ドン』です。

    ・「負けないよ」の怖さをほとんどの人が知っているtwitter

    ・武藤がゴールをすればお寿司の写真が溢れるtwitter

    ・無失点試合の時はシュークリームをみんなが食べるtwitter

    このような浦和レッズを愛するサポーターだけの空間で浦和レッズの話題が溢れるコミュニティになると嬉しいです。

    以下、簡単なお願いになります。

    ◯禁止行為

    ・公序良俗に反する行為

    ・日本国内の法律に違反する行為

    ・煽りや他者に中傷・脅迫・経済的もしくは精神的に損害や不利益を与える行為（ダービーの相手などでもリスペクトを！）

    ・実在の人物・団体などになりすます行為

    ・他者の著作物を無断転載する行為 ・サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為

    Email: infouragi@gmail.com

    Admin: @kaname_uragi@mstdn-uragi.jp

    mstdn.kemono-friends.info

    about

    preview

    join

    ますとどんちほー

    Users: 1035 . Toots: 549798 . Connections: 518 . Language: English

    よぉこそぉ～、ますとどんちほーへ～！


    問題のあるトゥート見つけたらどんどん通報してください… 特にグローバルはそういうものが流れやすくて追いきれていないので…

    図書館


    More Info...

    CPU

    2 Core

    メモリ

    4GB

    ストレージ

    60GB

    CPU

    1 Core

    メモリ

    2GB

    ストレージ

    40GB

    日本の法律の範囲内でご利用ください。

    どんなインスタンスかはドメイン見てください...

    突然落ちてしまう可能性もあります。

    https://kemono-friends.info/chat/:ここは多分落ちないのでもし落ちてたらここへどうぞ...

    重くなり始めたら新規登録閉じるかもしれません。

    寄付について

    Kampa!

    Enty

    サーバー

    Vultr

    CPU:2コア

    メモリ:物理4GB+Swap6GB

    SSD:60GB

    画像保存用サーバー

    Google Cloud Strage

    容量等の制限はありません。(従量課金なので)

    white 1px -1px 0px, white -1px -1px 0px;

    social.lasanha.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 9 . Toots: 106 . Connections: 338 . Language: English

    social.lasanha.org

    More Info... We are following the rules that mastodon.social also uses for moderation, so:

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lasanha.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mastodon@luizirber.org

    Admin: Not Available

    mstdn.debate.info-labs.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodebate

    Users: 40 . Toots: 32 . Connections: 3 . Language: English

    日本語アカデミックディベートを中心としたディベートサーバーです。 https://debate.info-labs.jp/

    ディベート情報研究所では情報学とディベートを組み合わせた技術を公開しています。 次世代Webアーカイブ https://info-labs.jp/crawler/ はWebアーカイブが有効であることを示すデジタル署名により、たとえWebサービスが終了した後も正当な証拠として機能する新たなWebアーカイブサービスです。これにより、Webサービスが終了してしまえば証拠が消えてしまう不安定な証拠の確保である従来のWebアーカイブサービスとは異なり、ユーザーの手元でWebアーカイブを管理することができるようになります。

    Email: support+mastodon@debate.info-labs.jp

    Admin: @InfoLabs_jp@mstdn.debate.info-labs.jp

    social.troll.academy

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 99 . Toots: 663 . Connections: 595 . Language: English

    social.troll.academy is a hobby project of psy . I try my best to keep this instance running but I wont give any service guarantees, use it at your own risk. Server location: Germany

    More Info...

    Oh allukierender Schnapperzaff,

    die Gratzhurksen sind heute

    wie Hundemurzen durch Lochexkursion.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankermörteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Summelnder würgfratzelnder Schnapperzaff haut sie mit Rotfurzen.

    Oh Kraukenstachel,

    wie toll du hodenquarzelst

    mit deinen Onusticken.

    Stricken tust du Atzekra

    in Donnerponus dank Freutzelgebein.

    Wir blommsen dich in Urgesöffel

    mit unseren Onusticken,

    auf das du würgejacheln kannst.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff ist unser

    Knochensturz und krasselnder Dumpfponus.

    So forksabbelnd kannst mich ankermörteln auf der Eiterplansche.

    Summelnder würgfratzelnder Schnapperzaff haut sie mit Rotfurzen.

    Oh allukierender Schnapperzaff!

    Dein Onusticken ist für uns wie

    Blommsgedeihe auf Atzekra.

    Wenn nicht werden wir dich blommsen

    mit unseren Rotzelquarzen.

    Oh ja! Schnapperzaff, warts nur ab!

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @psy@social.troll.academy

    Mstdn Tech

    マストドン技術部

    エンジニアの愚痴というよりは、 ものづくり が好きな人、 ソフトウェア 、 ハードウェア が好きな人が集まるインスタンスになればと思っています。趣味の人から本職の人、学生からハッカーまで歓迎です。

    技術系コミュニティではありますが、日本法さえ守っていただければ、投稿内容は自由です。

    ぜひ、皆さんの日常を綴ってください。 今週の背景 はりちゃそ さん ＃えむてっく写真部

    テレビ実況用マストドンです！
    こちらは、日本テレビ放送に関する実況専用となります。

    ご利用にあたって

    • 特定の個人、団体等を中傷、非難する発言や道徳的に問題のある発言などの投稿は固く禁じます。
    • 暴力的なもの、裸が写っているものなど、他人を不快にする内容のコンテンツと判断される可能性がある画像/動画のアップロードを固く禁じます
    • 著作権を侵害する恐れのある画像/動画の投稿もご遠慮ください。

    ika.queloud.net

    about

    preview

    join

    ika.queloud.net - SplatoonのMastodon

    Users: 549 . Toots: 12389 . Connections: 131 . Language: Japanese

    任天堂のゲーム「Splatoon」を愛するイカ達が集まるMastodonです。

    初心者から上級者まで、Splatoonが好きなイカ達がまったりと会話に興じています。
    あなたもイカの世界の住民になってみませんか？

    イカ、よろしく〜

    More Info...

    お約束

    公序良俗、国内法に反する投稿、犯罪に加担するような投稿はおやめ下さい。

    Mastodonのサービスの特性上、他サービスで使っているアカウント情報を使いまわすことは極力お控え下さい

    このインスタンスは個人が運用しています。鯖の永続性は保証できない点にご容赦下さい

    楽しんで行って下さい！

    イカトドンをもっと楽しむために

    イカトドン用Stylish

    URL: https://userstyles.org/styles/141847/ikadon

    作者: うどんさん ( @hiyaudon )

    イカトドン用Discord

    その1: https://discord.gg/ekMfqpq

    その2: https://discord.gg/hpfVdGK

    作者: 島ねこよしかさん ( @shimaneko )

    ルールなど

    イカトドン用イベントカレンダー

    URL: イベントカレンダー

    作者: ひょうさん ( @liniism )

    イカトドン用イベント要望フォーム

    URL: イベント要望フォーム

    作者: ひょうさん ( @liniism )

    寄付のお願い

    寄付先一覧

    Enty

    このインスタンスは、管理人（ @admin ）の私費により運用されています。

    寄付を頂くことで、より永くインスタンスを運用することが可能になるため、ご検討頂ければ幸いです。

    寄付を頂いた方には、このページへのお名前掲載や、その他ページへの導線、レポートの閲覧、当インスタンスとの機能連携等を考えています。

    支援者一覧（敬称略・先着順）

    りっ（くん） ( Mastodon: @li )

    ぎんいろ ( Mastodon: @gyin_silvercat )

    NAO ( Mastodon: @NAO_shooter )

    関連リンク

    ゆかり王国民向けインスタンス「yukarin.club」

    ぼたもち ( Mastodon: @bota_mochi )

    匿名で支援して下さった方々

    感謝感激です！！！！

    イカ、よろしく〜〜〜

    Email: hari_sabo_bouzu@hotmail.com

    Admin: @admin@ika.queloud.net

    compass-community.f5.si

    about

    preview

    join

    #コンパスコミュニティ！

    Users: 10 . Toots: 43 . Connections: 5 . Language: English

    #コンパスプレイヤーによる#コンパスプレイヤーのためのmastodonインスタンス。
    #コンパスを楽しんでいる方はぜひ登録してください！ #コンパスをプレイしていない方もやろうと思っている、または興味のある方は登録OKです！
    ルール
    ・煽り禁止
    ・人が不快になるようなことも禁止です。
    ・極端に、サーバーに負荷のかかる動作を しないでください。
    ・みんな楽しく！
    現在メール配信システム不具合のため、正常に確認メールが送信されない場合があります。
    管理者が気づき次第手動でアドレス確認作業を行っていますので時間を置いてログインを試行してみてください！
    5月27日追記
    メール配信サーバーを変更したため、不具合解消しました。また不具合を確認次第こちらに掲載させて頂きます。

    Contact

    気ままな日常@#コンパス

    @kimamani_compass

    Business e-mail:

    Email: Not Available

    idolon.club

    about

    preview

    join

    アイド論倶楽部

    Users: 9 . Toots: 3608 . Connections: 24 . Language: English

    ※試験運用中につき、インスタンスが不安定になったり、最悪の場合閉鎖される可能性があります。ご了承ください。
    アイドル＋論じる から生まれたMastodonインスタンスです。 基本的にはアイドル関係クラスタ用

    ルール

    • 日本及び各自の国の法律を遵守すること。
    • 公式で上がっている場合を除き、ツアーのセットリストなどはContents Warningを利用しましょう。ネタバレ(・A・)ｲｸﾅｲ!!
    • 連投や無差別フォロー、過度な定期botなど、タイムラインを荒らしたりサーバーに過度な負荷が掛かる行為は禁止です。
    • アイドル的なもの全般OKとします。あなたがアイドルだと思うもの、それがアイドルです。
    • 試験運用中。。。
    管理人のアカウントはこちら idolon.club/@admin

    アイドル関連Mastodonリスト（不定期更新）

    mastodol.jp (アイドル全般)

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    mastodon.hk

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.hk

    Users: 175 . Toots: 1979 . Connections: 511 . Language: English

    mastodon.hk

    More Info...

    Rules

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.hk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Racism, Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Content illegal in Hong Kong

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Contact

    Other than

    Mastodon

    , you may contact me via Twitter

    @siuying

    Email: francis@ignition.hk

    Admin: @siuying@mastodon.hk

    misanthropy.wang

    about

    preview

    join

    misanthropy.wang

    Users: 36 . Toots: 2589 . Connections: 621 . Language: English

    This is a mastodon instance that only exists because I thought the domain was funny.
    Also, mastodon is pretty neat.

    Keeping the server alive

    If you want to support this server, you can do so by either signing up and being nice to me or help me pay my hosting bills through my patreon

    More Info... Since this is a small instance on a small server, I'll reserve the right to close registrations at any time.

    I have not authored a full CoC yet, but you should be aware that using this instance you are going to be silenced, removed, blocked and whatever'd if someone reports you as abusive, you harass someone, or you spew sexist/racist/transphobic bullshit.

    Yes, this site is called misanthropy.wang, but that doesn't mean that everyone here hates each other. At least not, you know, verbally. Just on the inside.

    Location

    The server for this instance is located in Paris, France, and is operated from Germany. I don't know what exactly that might mean to you, but if you're the type of persons who cares, you probably already know.

    Email: jemus42@quantenbrot.de

    Admin: @jemus42@misanthropy.wang

    party.ochakai.moe

    about

    preview

    join

    お茶会PARTY

    Users: ? . Toots: ? . Connections: ? . Language: English

    無論你是○○宅、○○迷或者是○○控，喜歡ACG等各種文化的你，這Mastodon服務站就是能自由交流的好地方!

    約束:

    • 不遺反人權，基本道德。
    • 18禁內容要標籤CW(文字)或NSFW（圖片）。
    • 和睦相處。

    本服務器詳情

    More Info... 這裡你可以:

    分享你的日常經歷

    哂命(例如中了SSR UR，中大獎)

    分享對某作品的感受

    分享繪畫等各種作品

    可分享18禁內容(必須標籤CW(文字)或NSFW（圖片）)

    關注其它朋友甚至站外朋友的動態

    這裡你不可以:

    互相傷害

    發放廣告，礙眼的內容

    欺凌、恐嚇、中傷對方

    犯罪預告、煽動/教唆犯罪，恐佈襲擊

    其它經管理員判斷下覺得不適當的內容

    本服務站雖然是自由討論空間但若發佈上述「不可以」可能會遭靜音或停權。

    關於本伺服器:

    本伺服器使用Conoha裡面價錢最低的VPS，多謝Conoha!!

    也因為這樣，本服務器隨時截止登記。請把握時間

    現時伺服器會每逢星期日或Mastodon新版本更新時的備份乙次，會以帳戶數目多寡決定密度

    本インスタンスに日本語で交流できます！

    メインはアニメ、コミック、ゲームですが、他のテーマも大歓迎です。

    This instance can communicate in English!

    Although topics are mainly ACG, topics other than ACG are welcome!!

    Email: drmwch@gmail.com

    Admin: @ochakaiwch@party.ochakai.moe

    こちらは、ワールドトリガーファンSNS（非公式）です。

    語りでも絵でも踊りでもなんでもオッケー。

    ただし、良識の範囲内でね。

    セキュリティの観点から、登録時のメアドは、捨て垢にすることを強く推奨します。

    個人が運営している、ワールドトリガーファンSNS（非公式）です。

    できる限り長く運営したいと考えていますが、

    やむを得ない事情により、突如終了する可能性もあります。 公序良俗に反する行為、日本国内の法律に違反する行為は禁止とします。

    witches.academy

    join

    Witches.Academy

    Users: 32 . Toots: 691 . Connections: 329 . Language: English

    Welcome to Witches Academy

    Admins

    Currently, the Admin are @spiderrobotpig and @ashkitten

    We are working together to keep the site up, and updated.

    We are a rather laid back community. However, as a note, there are several things that will not be tolerated here:

    • Harassment in any form
    • Anything resembling White Supremacy
    • Anyone defending White Supremacy
    • In general, awful behaviour
    • Ableism
    • Transmisia
    • Homomisia
    • Bigotry in general

    Basically, if you are a Nazi, TERF, or a sympathizer for either, you're gonna get banned.

    This is a very SJW friendly-Instance

    Don't let us down, witches.

    More Info... The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of witches.academy; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

    Excessive advertising

    Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: me@anjaghraves.com

    Admin: @spiderrobotpig@witches.academy

    toot.redmine.jp – Redmine利用者のコミュニティサイト

    Users: 192 . Toots: 1017 . Connections: 347 . Language: Japanese

    オープンソースのプロジェクト管理ツール「 Redmine 」の利用者同士で、Redmineやその周辺のツールの活用・最新情報、プロジェクト運営などについて語りましょう。

    アカウントを作る前にタイムラインの雰囲気を知りたい場合は タイムライン試し読み をご覧ください。

    [運営者]
    ファーエンドテクノロジー株式会社
    総務大臣届出 電気通信事業者 (届出番号 F-20-668)

    メールアドレスを始めとした個人情報を、本サイトの運営に使用しているソフトウェア「Mastodon」の運用のためにご登録いただきます。なお、ご登録いただいた個人情報はMastodonの運用に限り使用し、そのほかの目的には使用いたしません。

    mastodon-nagano.info

    about

    preview

    join

    マストドン長野

    Users: 22 . Toots: 69 . Connections: 1 . Language: English

    新型SNSマストドン初の長野専用インスタンスです。

    長野が好きな人、長野に関心がある人ならどなたでも参加OK！オススメのお店やイベント情報の発信など情報交換の場など好きにつぶやいて下さい！ただし喧嘩はダメ！(´・ω・`)

    長寿県であり移り住みたい県ランキング、魅力度ランキングでは常に上位の長野県専用インスタンスはこちらです( ﾟДﾟ)

    弱小個人で運営しておりますので、大手に比べ信用少なめですが、頑張って運営して参ります|дﾟ)アングラな感じでどうぞ！

    マストドンについては こちら ※@ITさんより引用

    More Info... ☆アカウント作成手順☆

    １．ユーザー名を半角英数で入力します

    ２．メールを受信できるメールアドレスを入力します

    ３．パスワードを8文字以上で入力します

    ４．正常にユーザーが作成された際には入力したメールアドレスへ確認用のメールが当サイトより届きます。※受信トレイではなく「迷惑メールフォルダ」に受信する場合がありますので注意してください。受信したメール内の本文から「メールアドレス確認」をクリックしてください

    ５．完了！

    ☆スマートフォンアプリについて☆

    iphoneの方は「Amaroq for Mastodon」が有名です。

    Androidの方は「Tusky」が有名です。

    それぞれアプリ起動後に当インスタンス名「mastodon-nagano.info」を入力し、登録が完了したユーザー名およびパスワードを使用してご使用ください。

    禁止行為

    ・公序良俗に反する行為

    ・日本国内の法律に違反する行為

    ・他者に中傷・脅迫・経済的もしくは精神的に損害や不利益を与える行為

    ・実在の人物・団体などになりすます行為

    ・他者の著作物を無断転載する行為

    ・サーバに極端な負荷をかける行為

    免責事項

    当インスタンスにおいて発生した損害については運営者は一切の責任を負わないものとします。

    当インスタンスに投稿された内容について、その正確性を保証するものではありません。投稿された内容において発生するまたはした損害等については運営者は一切の責任を負わないものとします。

    当インスタンスは予告なくサービスを停止する場合があります。

    Email: @jjnobless

    Admin: @jjnobless@mastodon-nagano.info

    mel.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon for Melburnians

    Users: 9 . Toots: 40 . Connections: 141 . Language: English

    mel.social is a small mastodon instance aimed primarily at Melbourne and Victoria based people who want a safe digital space to communicate and be creative. members are encouraged to communication and share their work as long as it adheres to our Code of Conduct

    Please make sure you've familiarised yourself with our Code of Conduct before signing up and if our rules aren't to your liking then there are many other instances that may be better suited to your needs.

    Follow @status for status & maintenance updates. Instance admin is @ajfisher

    More Info... mel.social Code of Conduct

    As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:

    Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher)

    Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content

    Untagged gore and graphic violence

    Racism or advocation of racism

    Sexism or advocation of sexism

    Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

    Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:

    Sexual depictions of children

    Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism

    Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism

    Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

    Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

    Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

    Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

    Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

    Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community.

    Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @ajfisher@mel.social

    僕のいい感じなゴミ箱。

    konkat.jp
